Ngomsa woMsindisi ngom’ eduze kwAkhe, Woba nenkanyez’ umqhele na?

CHORUS
Woba nenkanyezi umqhele wami na? Ekufiken ezulwini
Ngi vuka nababusiswa ngi yekhaya Woba nenkanyezi umqhele?

Ngamandl’ eNkosi ngo ‘ebenza ng’khuthele, Ma ngi linde, ngi zuz’ abantu
Ngize ngithol’ inkanyezi ngalolosuku, Mhla edunyiswayo uJesu

Koba mnandi njani nxa ngi mbona Yena? Ngi beke kuYe amagugu
Kongithokozisa ngobuhl’ emzini, Ngi phiw’ inkanyezi ng’uKrestu

title: 152  Khuluma Kimi
content:
152 Khuluma Kimi

Khuluma kimi Jesu, Yisho ngezw’ elihle
Nyenyeza ngokomusa, Awusele wedwa
Vul’ inhliziy’ ikuzwe, I lalele izwi
Yenz’ umoy’ u kubonge, KuWe ngi thabele

CHORUS
Khuluma u nyenyeze ilizwi lothando
Njalo woba ngumnqobi, u yokhululeka
Nkosi khuluma njalo, ngezwi lokuthemba
Ma ngo zwe okushoyo, Awusele wedwa

Khuluma kithi njalo, Si bonis’ indlela
Si gcwalis’ intokozo, Si fund’ umkhuleko
Kuthi ngokuzidela, Sibe yib’ abAkho
Sheshis’ umbus’ ozayo, Si wuthokozele

Khuluma njengendulo, lapho bazi Wena
Ngaz’ umsebenzi wami, Ngenz’ umthetho
wAkho; Ngenze ngi kudumise, Ngi sh’
udumo lwAkho; Ngi vume ukuthunywa,
Ngi hloniphe Wena

title: 153 Okwanamhla Nje
content:
153 Okwanamhla Nje

Nkosi, angi thandezeli kwangomuso
Ma ngi ngawi esonweni okwanamhla
Ma ngi ngasho lizwi ngi ngacabanganga
Bek’ uphawu ez’ndlebeni okwanamhla

Ngo sebenza ngi khuthale, ngi thandaze
Ngi zoba mnene, ngi thobe okwanamhla
Ngiph’ amandla, ngi sheshe ukuhlonipha
Ngi vum’ ukuzinikela okwanamhla

Uma kungathi ngi fe khona namhlanje
Ma ngi ncike kuzo iz’thembiso namhla
Ngak’ okwangomso a ngi kukhulekeli
Ngi gcine, ngeluse, ngi bambe kwanamhla.
Amen

title: 154 Mlindi, Ngitshele
content:
154 Mlindi, Ngitshele

Mlindi ngitshele ngokusa,
Ngobuhle beZioni
Na ngeziboniso zAkhe,
uMyeni ‘se sondele!
Mhambi, Ye! suka
Qaphela Ku yasa ukukhanya
Yembatha ingubo yakho
Se kuzokusa, vuka!

Mlindi, bona imisebe,
Ikhanya endleleni
Iz’boniso wonk’ umhlaba
Zi sh’ ilang’ elizayo
Nxa kukhala icilongo,
Li vus’ abasolwandle
Abangcwel’ abafileyo
Ba gqokisw’ ukungafi!

Ukukhanya ku yakhwela,
Umnyaka weSabatha;
Si yamemeza ngamazwi,
Umbuso useduze;
Mhambi, Ye! Ngi bona ngale
Ubuhle beKhenani;
Nomuzi nobuhle bawo!
Nokuphakama kwawo

We’mlindi, uMnini-muzi
NguMbusi was’eZioni;
Ehlel’ es’hlalweni sAkhe,
U busa yonk’ imoya;
Emagqumen’ akhanyayo
Anemiseve emihle;
Nemithob’ empompozayo
Nembal’ enhl’ osebeni!

Mlindi izwe li seduze
Nez’ thelo azipheli
Ngale O, ku yathabisa!
NeMbali yas’ Edeni;
Lalela ba yahlabela,
Ku yeza emoyeni
Nez’ gidi ziyahlabela
Masinya soba nazo

title: 162 Yonke Indlela
content:
162 Yonke Indlela

uJesu u ya ngi hola
A ngi celi okunye
Ngi nga sola umsa wAkhe
Yena onguMholi na?
Ngi nokuthul’ okwezulu,
Nxa ngakhile naYeke
Ngo’ba ngi yazi ukuthi: U yeza konke kakhe.

Yonk’ indlel’ u yankihola
Indlel’ i lula ngaYe
U yangipha ukunqoba
A ngi fuze ngesinkwa
Nxa ngi dinwe ukuhamba
Nomoya sewomile
Ngi yabona ngaphambili Lomthombo wosindiso.

Yonk’ indlel’ u yangihola
O! yek’ uthando lwAkhe
Ngi yathenjiswa okuhle
Endlini ka Baba le
Nxa ngi thol’ impilo entsha
Ngi phaphel’ ezulwini
Ngi yocula njalo njalo, UJesu wongihola

title: 163 Ngi Lapha Ngi Thume
content:
163 Ngi Lapha Ngi Thume

Yizwa uJesu ebiza
Nguban’ ozosebenza?
Amasimu a vuthiwe
Nguban’ othwal’ iz’thungu?
iNkosi i yamemeza
Nank’ umvuzo wesihle
Uphi ozokusho athi,
Ngi la Nkosi ngi thume?

Um’ u ngewele ulwandle
U y’ekubahedeni
O yobafica eduze
Ba hlalelene nawe
Nob’ u ngesiy’ ingelosi
Nob’ u ngase Paule
Woland’ uthando lweNkosi
Uthi, Yafela bonke

Uma u ngebe uMlindi

U sho indlela yezulu
Yomusa kubo bonke
Ngom’thandazo nokuphana
Wenz’ intando yeNkosi
U kholeke njengo Aron
Ephasa umprofethi

Nxa im’pefumlo i’ bhubha
iNkosi i kubiza
Yek’ izaba zobuvila
Uthi, ngi ngenze lutho
Yenz’ umsebenzi u vume
U jabulele wona
Ibiza shesh’ u sabele
Ngi lapha Nkosi, ng’thume!

title: 164 Ezinyaweni Zika Jesu
content:
164 Ezinyaweni Zika Jesu

Ez’nyaweni zika Jesu
Ngi zw’ amazwi amahle

Ngiy’ thand’ insuku zonke
Ez’nyaweni ngi qaphele
Konke osekudlule

Ngi thol’ ukuphumula

content:
165 Ngi Yakuthanda

content:
166 Dwala Laphakade

Wahleshulelwa mina,

A ngi kaphithi lutho,

Ngi nqunu, ma ngembeswe,
Ngi bheke umsa wAkho;
Ngi sondel’ emthonjeni,
Msindisi ma ngi hlanzwe

Nanxa se ngi layela,

Se ngi shon’ emnyameni,
Ngi lindel’ ukwahlulwa;

Ma ngi zifihle kuWe

168 UJehova, Ng’uMelusi Wami

uJehova u ng’uMelusi wami

Nomphefumulo wami u buyiswe

Ngi holwa endleleni yokulunga

Ngokuba, Wena Jehova, u nami

content:
172 Koze Kube Nini?

Nkosi, se koba nini, U ngafikile na?
Inhliziy’ ikhathele, Ngokwephuza kwAkho;
Soba nin’ isikhathi, Esihle kakhulu,
Ukukhazimla kwAkho, Ku qhamke kwabAkho.

Ku nini Nkosi yomsa, U phune ekhaya?

Yingcosan’ elungile, Ekujabulele.

O vus’ abaleleyo, Tum’ izwi ba vuke.
Abangcwele maba thi, \"uJesu’ u sondele.\"
Mazivuth’ izibani, Zi boshw’ izinkalo.
Bonke ba lingisele, Injabul’ enkulu!

content:
173 O, Ngenkolo!

Ngi fun’ inkol’ engesabi
Nom’ i sezitheni.

Benswelo nosizi.

Engebubule i sole,
Noma i sishaywa;
Ngesikhathi sobuhlungu,

Inkolo ekhazimlayo

Nobuqili bonke.

Nkosi ngi ph’ inkol’ enjalo;
Noma ku ngehlani.
Ngozwa lapha ubumnandi,
Bekhay’ ezulwini.

content:
174 Yeka Kuthokozisa!

175 Msindisi, Nje NgoMalusi

Msindisi, nje ngomalusi, Si hole ngomsa wAkho,

Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Was’ thenga si ngabAkho;

content:
176 Ithemba Elibusisiwe

Kunethemb’ elihle;
Li yigugu lona.

Injabulo yezwe.

Kukhon’ inkanyezi

Izwi leKhalvari

177 Akukho Ubusuku Le!

178 U Yabuya uKrestu

Yena, umkhumbi wesisa u mzungeze: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.

Yek’ injabulo s’enyuka si ngafanga! Akukho, sililo, kudana nakufa.
Emafwini obukhosi si hlwithelwe: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.

content:
181 Ekulindeni Nasekuqapheleni

Is’khathi a saziwa sona, Ayobuya ngaso lapha;
Kumbe kuyakuba ‘ntambama, Kumb’ ebusuku impela:
Kumb’ ekuthatheni kokusa, Mani qaphele, ni lunge;
Zi ngabocima izibani, Ma si mlinde, si mqaphele.

CHORUS
Linda qaphela, Linda qaphela,
Linda qaphela, Si qaphela Wena Nkosi.

Ngomsa wAkhe ngi yakhumbula, Intengo a s’thenge ngaYo.
Wa shiy’ izindlu zobukhosi, Weza lapha emhlabeni;
Ngi yazi kuhle eNkosini, Uma thina esifele,
Izosifumanisa sonke Si lindele, si qaphele.

O! Jesu Wena, Mhlengi wami, U yalaz’ ithemba lami;
Eliyakubona ngamehlo, Nxa se ngi kuzw’ u ‘thi, Woza.
Abanye, bona ba ngesaba Nxa u qhamuka, Mahluli,
Qa, mina ngi thol’ isihlobo Ngi zolinda, ngi qaphele.

title: 182 Ukusa Okubhejayo
content:
182 Ukusa Okubhejayo

Ukusa ku yeza masinyane, uJes’ u yeza;
Ukuba athabathe abAkhe, A bas’ ekhaya.

CHORUS
Si bona ukusa okubhejayo, Bu yadlul’ ubusuku,
O! imisebe ebonakalayo, I vus’ iz’thuku.

Se li zakuyiswa ivangeli, Ezizwen’ zonke;
Kasoze o libale uMyeni Yi sh’ icilongo!

Zi yakumphelekezela, Zonke Izingelosi,
uJesu nxa ezothath’ abAkhe Kophel, usizi.

Abakithi abakade bafa ba yakubonwa,
Inyembezi zokulilelana zi yakwesulwa.

title: 183 Bambelela Ngize Ngi Buye
content:
183 Bambelela Ngize Ngi Buye

Sihl’ is’thembiso, kwabakholwayo,
Masinya ngi yeza ngithath’ abAmi,
Bamba ngi yeza, yinkul’ ingozi;
U ngalali njengabanye, lindela!

CHORUSBamba ngi yeza, sihl’ isithembiso,
Umbus’ u buyile, Wowunikwa,
Woz’ u jabule, hlal’ embusweni,
Im’qhel’ i lindile, bamba ngi yeza.

Solindela zi vuth’ izibani;
Kwabany’ u fika njengesel’ eb’suku,
U sesondele, a saz’ usuku
Njengokuhluma, ku khomba ihlobo.

Ithemba lethu la khel’ ezwini,
Ukuqhamuka okuhle kweNkosi,
Kwedlula zonke izithembiso:
Bamba ngi yeza, qina ngize ng’fike.

title: 184 Thabani iNkosi Iyeza
content:
184 Thabani iNkosi Iyeza

Thabani iNkos’ iyeza, Yamkeleni nonke!
Yilungiselen’ indawo,
Ni bonge uMbumbi, Ni bonge uMbumbi.
Ni boni bonge uMbumbi.

Thabani iza kubusa! Dumisani Yena,
Nxa amasimu namatshe,
Ebonga iNkosi, Ebonga iNkosi.
Ebo-ebonga iNkosi.

U zobusa uJehova! Dumisani Yena,
Ngobukhosi bokulunga,
Kwaziswe uthando, Kwaziswe uthando
Kwazi- kwaziswe uthando.

title: 185 Ukuba Khona
content:
185 Ukuba Khona

Si yokhuluma ngekhaya, Nelizw’ elivundileyo,
Ilizwe lakhona lihle, Nokuhlala khona kuhle!
Si khuluma ngezindlela; Nangendong’ ezikhanyayo,
Li yamangalisa lona Kunjan’ ukuhlala khona.

Si yasho akuko sono, Nosizi nokuhlupheka;
Laph’ izilingo azikho, Kunjan’ ukuhlala khona!
Si yakhuluma ngothando, Nezingub’ ezambathwayo.
Ibandla loqobo lile, O kuhl’ ukuhlala khona!.

Ngi lungile lapha mina; Ngize ngi ye ezulwini,
Masinyane ngi zokuzwa, Ubumnandi bakhona le.
Si zohamb’ emasimini, Ngobukhosi obukhulu,
Izingelosi za khona, Kanye noJesu ngokwAkhe.

title: 186 Nkosi, Si Hlangene
content:
186 Nkosi, Si Hlangene

Nkosi, si hlangene,
Kuyo indlu yAkho;
Woza naWe sesi ngene
Ebusweni bAkho.

Inhliziyo yethu
Iyakugulela;
Nawo umphefum’lo wethu,
U yakukhalela.

Ukunxusa kwaAkho,
Baba, ma si kuzwe;
Nxa kuphenywa izwi lAkho
NaWe ma si kuzwe.

Ma u si lungise
Thina bantu bAkho;
Nxa si bhubha, si buyele
Othulini lwAkho.

title: 187 Yokwehlukana Ingoma Yethu
content:
187 Yokwehlukana Ingoma Yethu

Msindisi, futhi si hlabelela,
Ingoma yethu yokwehlukana;
Si bheke ukubusiswa nguWe,
Izwi lokuthula ma si phiwe

Size si goduke nokuthula;
Nanxa si vuka, nanxa si lala;
Lind’ im’lomo nenhliziyo zethu,
Nxa se si zophuma kuyo lendlu

Si ph’ukuthula ekuphileni,
U si duduze ekukhaleni,
Lapho o thi kithi, ku phelile!
Nkosi, si bize size si phum’le

title: 188 Wafa Ngenxa Yami
content:
188 Wafa Ngenxa Yami

Ngi ngomkhulu umoni, uJesu wangifela,
Waf’ ukuba ngi phile, Waf’ ukuba ngi ngafi.
Njengegatsh’ evinini, Se ngi ngoWakhe nami.

Lud’ uthando lweNkosi, Phezulu, lu phakeme;
Lu yadlula ulwandle, Lu yahlala anini;
Lwangizuza ngi sona, Ngangingamdingi Yena

Nakhona ngi ng’umoni, Ukrestu yiko konke;
Ukwazi kahle konke, Ukuhlupheka kwami;
Ngi zophephela kuYe, Emhlabeni ozayo

title: 189 Akukho Muzi Omileyo Lapha
content:
189 Akukho Muzi Omileyo Lapha

Asakhil’ impela lapha,
Si ngabahamb’ emhlabeni;
Umoya weth’ u thokozaSi cabang’ umuz’ ozayo Si cabang’ umuz’ ozayo.

Asakhil’ impela lapha’
Si fun’ umuz’ osithele;
iZion’ iNkos’ ikuwo,
I khanya kube phakade,
I khanya kube phakade.

Indaw’ enhle yokuthula,
Yokuphumuz’ abahambi;
Engazathi ngi ngaphapha,
Ngi phumule khona mina,
Ngi phumule khona mina

Thula moya wami, thula!
iNkosi i yakusisho;
Son’ is’khathi sokuhamba;
Ma ngi zame lapha mina
Ma ngi zame lapha mina

title: 190 Ibizo Eliyigugu
content:
190 Ibizo Eliyigugu

Thath’ ibizo lika Jesu, We mntwana, wezinhlungu,
Yebo li yathokozisa, Ngako Yamkela lona

CHORUS
Ibizo, O, luhle!
Gugu lasezulwini
Ibizo, O, lihle!
Injabul’ emhlabeni

Thath’ ibizo lika Jesu, Li yasithokozisa,
Nxa u hanqwa izilingo Themba ku lelibizo

O, ibizo lika Jesu! Li yasithokozisa,
Nxa esesamkela thina Si mhlabelele Yena

Si guqa ngebizo lAkhe, Si we phambili kwAkhe,
Ey’ iNkosi enomqhele, S’omdumisa phakade

title: 191 Isithembiso Esiqinileyo
content:
191 Isithembiso Esiqinileyo

Ngeqinis’ uJesu ngowami, Yeka ubumnandi baphezulu
Manje ngi y’indlalifa nami; Egezw’ egazini leWundlu.

CHORUS
Ngi yathokoza ngalengoma; Ngi yadumisa uMsindisi,
Kim’ u ligugu yonk’ imihla Ngi dumis’ owam’ uMsindisi.

Ku phelele ukuthokoza, Ngi yabona okuthabisayo,
Ingelosi zi ngi lethela, Ukunyenyezake kothando.

Konke kimi ukuphumula, Ngi kuMsindisi ngi yathokoza:
Ngi mi ngi bheke phezulu le! Ngi gcwele okwAkh’ ukulunga.

title: 192 Dumisa iBizo LAkhe
content:
192 Dumisa iBizo LAkhe

Esiphambanweni laphaya, uMsindisi wachith’ igazi
Nami khona ngagezisiswa Dumisa Yena

CHORUS
Dumisa Yena, Dumis’ ibizo
Lapho kwahlanjwa inhliziyo, Dumisa Yena

Si khulu sona isimanga! Ngi sindisiwe ezonweni;
Ku mnand’ uJes’ u hlala nami Dumisa Yena.

Emthonjen’ ophilis’ izoni Ngi thabile se ngi ngenile;
uJesu u se ngi hlambile Dumisa Yena.

Woza kuloMthombo omnandi, Khuwo u ziphonse namhlanje;
U hlanjisiwe, u phelele Dumisa Yena

title: 193 Indlela yAkhe Nawe
content:
193 Indlela yAkhe Nawe

U thand’ ukuphil’ uJesu u msulwa na? U ngahamba naYe engcingweni na?
Kamb’ u ngamnika yonk’ imthwalo athwale na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.

CHORUS
Amandl’ Akhe angakuphendula, Igazi lAkhe li ngak’ khulula
Uthando lwAkhe lu gcwale kuwe; U thand’ u vumel’ intando yAkhe.

U vum’ akukhulule, wenz’ aku shoyo na? U thand’ ukuthul’ u dele konke na?
U fun’ akusindise ungab’ u sawa na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.

U thand’ ukuphumul’ embusweni wAkhe na? Wazini akusiza ngayo wena?
U ngamsebenzela ngako konk’ onako na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.

title: 194 Uthando Ekhaya
content:
194 Uthando Ekhaya

Kuhl’ endaweni zonke, ngothandw’ ekhaya,
Kuhle umsindo wonke, ngothandw’ ekhaya,
Ukuthula nenala, kuchume yonk’ indawo,
Is’khathi asizwakali, kukuhl’ ekhaya.

CHORUS
Uthando ekhaya, Is’khathi asizwakali, Ngothandw’ ekhaya

Ku jatshul’ efukwini, ngothandw’ ekhaya,
Kakukho sicanulo, ngothandw’ ekhaya,
Indlel’ ihlotshisiwe, yonk’ indawo i yihle,
Konke ku jabulise, ngothandw’ ekhaya.

Phezulu ku yathatshwa; Ngothandw’ ekhaya;
Umhlab’ u gcwel’ ubuhle, Ngothandw’ ekhaya.
Imfundlan’ ihlokoma,Izulu li cwathile.
iNkos’ i yathokoza, iNkos’ i yathokoza.

Jesu ng’enze owAkho, ngothandw’ ekhaya
Ngi zidele njengaWe, ngothandw’ ekhaya
Ngophepha engozini, Ngi ngakhathazwa bubi
Ngi busisiwe nguWe, Ngothandw’ ekhaya

title: 195 O, Yeka Umlilo Lowo!
content:
195 O, Yeka Umlilo Lowo!

Ngi yafuna lowo mlilo,
Wabangcwele basendulo;
Wabaqondis’ ezulwini,
Benesibind’ engozini.

U phi Nkosi lowo Moya
Ophawul’ uAbrahama;
Owathambis’ uPaule,
Wazuz’ amandla ezulu.

Amandl’ abe kuElijah,
A saphela yini namhla?;
A khazimlis’ uMosisi,
uJobe wabekezela.,

Nkosi, khumbula endulo,
Pind’ u thele umsa wAkho;
Nxa si zibhekise kuWe,
Thel’ uMoya wAkh’ oNgcwele.

title: 196 A Khon’ Amandl’ eGazini
content:
196 A Khon’ Amandl’ eGazini

U fis’ ukwethulwa isono na? A khon’ amandla egazini;
U fis’ ukunqoba okubi na? A khon’ amandl’ egazini.

CHORUS
A khona mandla egazini, LeWundlu leWundlu
A khona mandla egazini, Gazin’ elihle leWundlu

U fis’ ukudela ulaka na? A khon’ amandla egazini;
Woza u zohlanzwa kulo wena A khon’ amandl’ egazini.

U yafisa ukuba mhlophe qhwa! A khon’ amandla egazini;
Woza u zohlanzwa kulo wena A khon’ amandl’ egazini.

U ngesebenzele iNkosi na? A khon’ amandla egazini;
U fisa ukuyidumisa na? A khon’ amandl’ egazini.

title: 197 Akukho Sigodi Esimnyama
content:
197 Akukho Sigodi Esimnyama

Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;
Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;
Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;
Nxa ezothath’ abAkhe.

CHORUS
Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe,
Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe,
Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza
Ebayisa ekhaya

Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;
Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;
Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;
Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.

Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;
Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;
Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;
Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.

Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;
Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;
Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;
Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.

title: 198 Isihlobo Esihle NguJesu
content:
198 Isihlobo Esihle NguJesu

O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu Nxa u hanqiwe izinsizi.
Woqinis’ inhliziyo, Asuse lonk’ uvalo.
O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

CHORUS
Isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu, Esihl’ insuku ngensuku
Nxa u wa wokusiza, Nxa u khala wokuzwa,
O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

Yek’ isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu, U za kimi a ngi duduze.
Ngencikile kuYena, Ngi ngehlelwe nayini.
O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

Nxa ngedlul’ ethunzin’ losizi, Amanz’ eJordan’ egubhuza;
Ngi ngeshaywe luvalo, uJesu u nosizo.
O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

Nxa si fik’ ezulwin’ ekhaya, Nezingcwele sibendawonye;
Sohlabelel’ ogwin, Si bonge si ngaphezi.
O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

title: 199 Makubongwe uNkulunkulu
content:
199 Makubongwe uNkulunkulu

Makubongw’ iNkosi ngekwenzileyo,
Yathand’ ilizwe yasiph’ uJesu;
Wadel’ ukuphila ngezono zethu,
Wavula isango si ngene ngalo.

CHORUS
Bongani iNkosi, mawuzwe umhlaba,
Bongani iNkosi, yenamani ‘bantu,
Wozani kuYise ngay’ iNdodana;
Nimnike udumo ngakwenzileyo.

Yek’ inkululo ithengwe ngegazi!
Sithembiso seNkosi kokholwayo;
Isoni esibi esikholwayo
Masinya si yaxolelwa nguJesu.

Kukhul’ akwenzile wakufundisa;
Inkul’ intokozo ngay’ iNdodana,
Koba kuhle kuphakame, kumsulwa;
Lapho si bona senyuka noJesu.

title: 200 Ngcwele!, Ngcwele!, Ngcwele
content:
200 Ngcwele!, Ngcwele!, Ngcwele

Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Nkosi Somandla!
S’odumisa Wena ngovivi lokusa;
Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Wena u nomusa,
U yabusa njalo, Wena Nkosi.

Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! U yadunyiswa,
Izingelozi zi guqa kuWe, wedwa;
Izigidi zi ya Zi khuleka kuWe,
Ongepheliswe nanini nguWe.

Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Wen’ osithiwe
Noko iso lomuntu, li ngekubone;
Kakh’ omunye ogcwele Ngaphandle kwAkho,
U phelele, u namandla onke!

title: 201 Zangethusa Inhlonze Zika Jehova
content:
201 Zangethusa Inhlonze Zika Jehova

Zangethus’ inhlonze zika Jehova,
Nxa izono zami zingicwilisa,
Ngamemez’ iNkosi ngis’ odakeni,
Ngesisa yangibeka ekoneni

CHORUS
Yang’ khip’ odaken’ ol’bishayo,
Yangiqinisa eDwaleni,
Yafak’ ingoma kimi namhla,
Yokuvula Haleluya!

Yangigodl’ eDwaleni eduze kwaYo,
Ngasimama lapho ngisemi njalo,
Noma kunjani ngingephinde ngiwe,
Ngomusa wayo ngizuze umqhele!

Yangiph’ ingoma entsha yokudumisa,
Ubusuku nemini ngoyivula,
Kuchichim’ inhliziyo ngenjabulo,
Ngibon’ uMhlengi wami njalo njalo.

Sengobabaza engikwenzelweyo,
Baze bonke bakubone ngamehlo,
Kwandisw’ insindis’ eduze nakude
Bathembele kuNkulunkulu bonke.

Chorus
Wang’ khip’ odaken’ ol’bishayo Wangiqinisa eDwaleni Wafak’ ingoma kimi namhla Wokuvula Haleluya!

title: 202 Qhuba Mina
content:
202 Qhuba Mina

Nkosi Jesu ngiqhube Phakathi kwamalingo,
Aduma yonk’ indawo Wena Dwala ngifihle,
Is’qondiso esAkho Nkosi Jesu, ngiqhube.

Njengengan’ ithuliswa Ungathulis’ ulwandle.
Amanz’ ayalalela Uma uthi, Thulani!
Wena, Mbusi wolwandle Nkosi Jesu, ngiqhube

Nxa ngondela ogwini Namaza egubhuza,
Esitha ukuphumula Nxa ngincik’ es’fubeni
Mangizwe uthi kimi, Ungesabi qhubeka

title: 203 O, Masisakaze!
content:
203 O, Masisakaze!

O, masisakaze Indaba ezinhle,
Ebantwinibonke,
Endaweni zonke,
Ulim’ lwamaKrestu Malusho kakhulu.

Chorus
Nang’ uMthokozisi, Nang’ uMthokozisi,
Yena ufikile Ephum’ ezulwini,
KuBaba iNkosi O, makusakazwe,
Laku khon’abantu, Nang’ uMthokozisi!

Budlul’ ubusuku, Nans’ imin’ enkulu,
Sathul’ isililo,
Nolak’ olulwayo,
Phezu kwamagquma, Liyadlul’ ilanga

Bheka nans’ iNkosi, Ipheth’ insindiso,
Yomunt’ othunjiwe,
Ukuz’ akhululwe Ebumnyamenile
Kuvulwe kahlehle!

Ye’ alunqamuki Uthando lweNkosi,
Mabatshelwe ngalo
Abangaqondiyo,
Ngomsa mina ‘soni Ngofana neNkosi

Hlabe lunkenteze es’bhakabhakeni
Abangcwel’ ezulwini
Baphendule phansi
Hlabela ngothando, Olungephele qha!

title: 204 Buya, Mzuli Buya
content:
204 Buya, Mzuli Buya

Ezwen’ lezihambi, laph’ uyekhona, Yizwa izwi lithi, Ndodana yam’

Chorus
Buya mzuli buya, buyel’ ekhaya, U lahlekile kude, Woz’ ekhaya

Ezwen’ lendlala, Uphel’ amandla, Woz’ uzojabula, Ndodana yam’

Shiya izinhlanya, Suk’ osizini, Ugul’ emoyeni, Ndodana yam’

Umnyang’ uvuliwe, U se ngowanmi, Ngi sa ku bhekile, Ndodana yam’

U zulele kude, Woqhubeka na? Ngi ku thethelele, Ndodana yam’

Woza ekudleni, Aukhohliwe Woza enaleni, Ndodana yam’

Au nazihlobo, Au nakhaya, Ngi kuthanda njalo, Ndodana yam’

title: 205 Esanyenyeza UJesu
content:
205 Esanyenyeza UJesu

UJesu enyenyeza, Woza moni!
Nxa si kukhulekela, Woza moni!
Ku yilithub’ elihle, Woza moni!
Ku yisikhathi manje, Woza moni!

Unomthwalo onzima?, Woza moni!
U yakukuphumuza, Woza moni!
UJesu kakhohlisi, Woza moni!
U ya kunik’ ubomi, Woza moni!

O, yizwa esancenga, Woza moni!
U yakukubusisa, Woza moni!
Kuwe u yanyenyeza, Woza moni!
Nxa si kukhulekela, Woza moni!

title: 206 Wenzeni Na?
content:
206 Wenzeni Na?

Nganikela ukuphila kwami ngawe,
Ukuze u be ngohlengiweyo wena,
Nganikela ukuphila, Wa ngi nikani na?
Nganikela ukuphila, Wa ngi nikani na?

Indlu ka Baba ekhanyayo kakhulu,
Ngayishiya, ngeza ngaba nesizungu ,
Ngakushiya, ngakushiya konke ngenxa yakho,
Wena, washiyani ngenxa yomsebenzi wami?

Ngahlupheka oku ngalinganiswayo;
Ukukhulula wena ekubhubheni,
Ngakushiya, ngakushiya konke ngenxa yakho,
Wathwalani wena ngenxa yomsebenzi wami?

title: 207 Ngabon’ Othile Emthini
content:
207 Ngabon’ Othile Emthini

Ngabon’ Othile emthini Loph’ igazi kuYe,
Amehl’ Akh’ ez’nyembezeni Ngam’ eduze kwAkhe.

Wangikukisisa njalo Ngofa ngingakholwa,
Ngathola enye ingqondo Kungekh’ engakuzwa.

Impela waz’del owathi Konke ng’kuxolele!
Bangezwa bonke ngegazi Liyahlaulela.

Ukufa kubek’ obala Ububi besono;
Imfihlakalo yesisa Yenz’ intethelelo.

title: 208 Nyathela Ngokhuthamba
content:
208 Nyathela Ngokhuthamba

Thulani, thulani ku yanyenyezwa.
Thulani, yizwani Nazise izwi.

Chorus
Nyathel’ u nyonyoba, INkos’ i lapha,
Nyathel’ u nyonyoba, I khona lapha.

Thulani, thulani, Lendaw’ ingcwele,
Lomusa ilizwi, Se li thunyiwe.

Thulani, thulani Si sh’ umthandazo,
Si zwa ngeEdeni, Ngawo lomzuzu.

Thulani, thulani Mukhulu musa,
Thulani, thulani Si lind’ iNkosi

title: 209 O, Ngibe Ne Nkosi
content:
209 O, Ngibe Ne Nkosi

O, ngibe neNkos’ eduze Insika enkulu,
Ubhaq’ ol’khanyisa kude Indlela yeWundlu

Buya Jub’ el’Ngcwele, buya S’thunywa esimnandi,
Ngizond’ ongakuthandiyo Kwaku xosha kimi.

Ngangi nokuthula ngaWe Ngisakukhumbula,
Kusavuka njalo ngaWe Umoya Wok’thula.

Usithandwa esikhulu Noba sinjani nje!
Sihle sivela phezulu Ngiyas’khonza sinje.

title: 210 Yena UKrestu Usihlengile!
content:
210 Yena UKrestu Usihlengile!

Yen’ uKrestu usihlengile,
UMsindis’ osimanga Sihlengiwe, kuhlauliwe

Chorus
UMsindis’ osimamga!, UMsindis’ osimamga!
Ong’ uJesu wami UMsindis’ osimanga!, YiNkosi yami!

Ungihlanze egazini,
UMsindis’ osimanga Ung’buyisel’ eNkosini.

Usus’ inhliziyo embi,
UMsindis’ osimanga! Manj’ ubusa ngaphakathi

Ungaphal’ imini yonke,
UMsidis’ osimanga! Ngikholele ‘nsuku zonke.

Ungiph’ amandl’ okunqoba,
UMsindis’ osimanga! Ngiphumelele ngilingwa

Sengimph’ inhliziyo yami,
UMsindis’ osimanga! Izwe alihambi nami.

title: 211 Zi Yeza Izibusiso
content:
211 Zi Yeza Izibusiso

Zi yeza izibusiso Yiso isithembiso,
Ku ya kuvela umusa Nothando KuMsindisi.

Chorus
Izibusiso, Izibusiso zethu,
U yasiwela umusa, Si cela iz’busiso

Ziyeza izibusiso, Sothol’ imvuselelo,
Phezu kwentaba Ni yezwa Izulu se liyana

Zi yeza izibusiso Mazize kithi,
Nkosi Gcwalisa izethembiso Nkosi, u si qinise

Zi yeza izibusiso Size si vum’ izono,
Ku hle zi ze khona lapha Si hlanze Jesu namhla.

title: 212 Khufika Kimi Ubumnandi
content:
212 Khufika Kimi Ubumnandi

Kufika kim’ ubumnandi Bok’hlabelela ngiphinde,
Ngicule futhi nafuthi Ngesiph’ esihle seNkosi

Chorus
Ukuthula, Ukuthula, Isipho esimnandi,
O, kumangalisay’ ukuthula,
Sipho sothando se Nkosi

NgoKrestu ukuthula kwavela Ngokufa ngahlawulelwa,
Asikh’is’sekelo, Esidlula lesisipho.

UJesu sengiMbek’ umqhele Yagcwala eyam’inhliziyo
Zibusisa zakhe zodwa Ngazuza ukuthula.

KuJesu nginokuthula Nxa nginaye kuhl’ impela
Akuveli luth’olunye Ngaphandle kokuthula.

title: 213 Ingoma Yami
content:
213 Ingoma Yami

Jesu Msindisi wami U yingoma yami
U nguMsindisu wami Osizini lwami

Chorus
Jesu Msindisi wami, ngohlabela ngawe
Asikho isihlolo, Esifana nawe

Nguwe ithemba lami Yonk’ imnyaka yami
Nakuwo amathunzi U yingoma yam’

Jesu ‘liThemba lami Ungu Mholi wami
Uyisithandwa sami Lapha emhlabeni

U nge yam’ injabulo Ezweni lesono
Ngothaba ngawe njalo Ezulwini lakho

title: 214 Kamb’ UJesu Uyanaka Na?
content:
214 Kamb’ UJesu Uyanaka Na?

Kamb’ uJesu ‘nak’ inhliziyo,
Ijabule icula, Imthwal’ inzima,
Elethusizi, Kwenzi indlel’ ekathazayo.

Chorus
Uyanaka Ngi yamazi U yangidabukela;
Nxa ngiphel’ amandla
Nxa ngingalali, Uyang’ nak’ uJesu

Kamb’ uJes’ unak’ indlela yam?
Ngi novalo ngenqena, Kumnyam’ emini,
Sekuhwakele, Kamb’ usondel’ eduze kwam’?

Kamb’ uJes’ unak’ imizamo
Yokulwa nez’ lingo zam?
Ebuhlungwini, Ngingaphumuli Nenyembezi emehlweni?

Kamb’ uJes’ unaka nxa ngithi,
Sala sihlobo, ngifa, Ngidabukile,
Uthin’ uJesu Kamb’ uyanginaka yini?

title: 215 Linda U Ngasoli
content:
215 Linda U Ngasoli

Ikhay’ elethembekayo Lapho ku ngekh’ inkathazo
Ikhay’ elibusisiwe Sohlala si phunyuziwe

Chorus
Wena Linda, u bekezele
Wena Lind’ ungaze wasola
Linda Linda, Linda, u ngasoli

Nxa u sindwa imithwalo Oyinikiwe ng’uThixo
Ikhaya u lizondelele Linda u zubekezele

Nxa u sindwa imithwalo Kumbula kuye ekhanda,
Nxa i nosiz’ inhliziyo Yena wayenalo njalo.

Noma ku nzima qhubeka U ngakhohlwa kukhuleka
Ku seduze ukuphumla Linda u ngaze wasola.

title: 216 Wedwa?
content:
216 Wedwa?

Wedwa? Angingedwa um’ uJes’ ekhona,
Ngijatshuliswa nguYe, ngiyazi ukhona
Zungu? Qha! uJes’ ukhon’ isihlobo sami,
Kaguquki kuze kube sekupheleni

Chorus
Qha! Angingedwa, Qha! Angingedwa,
Khasoze angishiye ngedwa
Soze ngasala ngedwa, sala ngedwa

Ngiwe? Ngingewe ngis’ es’fubeni sAkhe,
Ngenelisiwe ukuphumula phakade Lutho?
Ngeyame kakhulu nginge lutho
Yona ingalo kaJesu kim’ inosizo

Yini? Ngilindele ngob’ uthi, ngenzani?
Ngimangale iNkosi ilibele ngani? Mnandi!
Kumnandi okungena kushiwo
Isisekelo seNkos’ esinenjabulo

title: 217 Yebo, Msindisi Wangithanda, Bo’
content:
217 Yebo, Msindisi Wangithanda, Bo’

Yebo, Msindisi wangithanda bo?
Nkosi manginga kuncishi lutho,
Ngothando umoya wami uzothoba,
Ushesh’ ukuthetha into yAkho.

Uyang’ shwelezel’ esihlalweni,
Ngehluleka ngibhek’ ezulwini,
Ngisize Jesu, ngithwale is’phambano,
Bese ngithandazel’ into yAkho

Ngiph’ inhliziyo efana naWe
Kuze ‘nsuku zonke ngibe naWe
Ngiqal’ umusebenzi, ngenz’ isenzo somsa
Ngibuyis’ omunye, into yAkho

Konke enginako isipho nje!
Ngentokozo kungo kw’Akho konke,
Kuth’ uma ngibona Yena ngeneliswe.
Njalo-na-njalo ngiy’ into yAkho

title: 218 Sinye Isisekelo
content:
218 Sinye Isisekelo

Sinye isisekelo seBandla nguJesu,
Isidalwa esisha ngamanzi, nangezwi,
Walenza umakoti wAkhe oligugu
Lathengwa ngegazi, walifela lingafi

Labakhethw’ emhlabeni wonke, kodwa linye,
Umgomo walo, yiny’ iNkosi, kuny’ uk’ kholwa
Liny’ igam’ el’ingcwele, kuny’ ukudl’ okungcwele;
Kukhon’ ithemba linye nokubekezela

Liyahlekwa, liyacindizelwa kakhulu;
Yisith’ esus’ uJesu lapho limi khona,
Abangcwele bahamba bebheke phezulu,
Masinya ukukhala kuzonyamalala

Enkathazweni nasekulingweni kwalo,
Lilinde ngokuthula umvuz’ ongapheli;
Kuthi ekugcineni lithol’ isi’busiso
Ibandl’ el’vele lidumisa lingayeki!

title: 219 Ngi Hole O, Jehova!
content:
219 Ngi Hole O, Jehova!

Ngihole Wena Jehova Ngi ngumhambi,
Nkosi yam’ U namandla, angi nawo Ngiya wacela kuWe
O, Msindisi! NguWe oSihlangu sam’

Lowo Mtombo wosindiso Owavulwa ngenxa yam’
Ma uvele umpompoze Uzigez’ izono zam’
O, Msindisi! NguWe oLusizo lwam’

Ngifikile eJordani Susa ukwesaba kwam’
U zungi phelekezele Yiba ungu Msizi wam,
O, Msindisi! NguWe oliThemba lam’

title: 220 Lakith’ Izwe
content:
220 Lakith’ Izwe

Lakith’ izw’ ekhaya, Zwe lenkululeko!
Le akumnyam’ ekhaya, Alisibekeli
Ngifis’ ekhaya kithi, Iy’khal’ inhliziyo
Abukho ub’hlung’ ekhaya, Lapho ngiya khona.

Eyam’ iNkos’ ekhaya, Nezidalw’ ezinhle!
Asikh’ ison’ ekhaya, Akhuko ‘isilingo!
Kuhutshw’ ingoma ekhaya, Ikhal’ endlebeni;
Uma ngicabang’ ekhaya, Inyembezi zehle;
Uma ngicabang’ ekhaya, Inyembezi zehle.

Abakhiley’ ekhaya, Bang’qhwebela kubo,
La lungekho usizi, Olungen’ ekhaya,
O, ngezwe lakith’ el’hle!, O ngokuphumula!
Krestu sibuyis’ ekhaya, Ngothand’ ol’hlengayo.

title: 221 Nxa Likhala Ijuva
content:
221 Nxa Likhala Ijuva

Nxa likhala ijuba ke Lenza kube kuhle kimi,
Bese ngicabang’ iNkosi Ngi khumbule eGalile.

Chrous
O! Galile elimnandi, Lapha kwakuthand’ uJesu,
O! Galile ‘lihuhlaza, woz’ uhlabelele kimi!

Lapha ku geleza ‘manzi Laph’ inyoni zi yabonga
Zi dumisa ngalilanga Ngodumo lwase Galile.

Nxa ngi bala kwakhona le NgaYe owa hamb’ olwandhle,
Ngi kufisa kodwa kandwa kanye Ukumlandel’ eGalile.

title: 222 Ez’ngalweni Z’ka Jesu Mina Ngiphephile
content:
222 Ez’ngalweni Z’ka Jesu Mina Ngiphephile

E’ngalweni zika Jesu, Mina ngiphephile,
Lapha ngothando lwAkhe Wophuml’ umoya wami,
Zwan’ izwi lez’ngelosi Liza ngengoma kimi!
Phakathi kwobukhosi Phesheya kolwandle.

Chorus
Engalweni zika Jesu, Es’fubeni sAkhe,
Lapha ngothando lwAkhe Wophuml’ umoya wam.

E’ngalweni zika Jesu Ngisind’ ekwoneni,
Nakuzo izilingo Singeng’ limaz’ isono,
Ngikhululw’ ebubini Nasekwesabeni.
Izilingo zimbalwa Kanye nenyembezi!

Jesu iNqaba yami Jesu wangifela;
Edwaleni ngoqina Themba laphakade
Linde ngibekezele Kudlul’ ubusuku,
Ngize ngibon’ ukusa ‘Gwini lwegolide.

title: 223 Ngiyamuzwa Umsindisi
content:
223 Ngiyamuzwa Umsindisi

Ngi yamuzwa uMsindisi Engibiza ngoMlandela;
Endlebeni ath’ amazwi Nsuku zonke, ungilandele.

Chorus
Ngi zothath’ isiphambano uMsindisi ngi Mlandele;
Laph’ engiholela khona Ngi be naYe yonke indlela.

Noma indlela imnyama Nezinyawo zi khathele,
Inhliziyo iyakhanya Nxa ngi Mlandela yonk’indlela.

UJesu engendulele Izulu li yakhazimla,
Ngi nikwe amandl’ amanye Nxa ngi Mlandela yonk’ indlela

Ngi hole esigodini U ngi phakele ukudla;
Nkosi, nginced’ ebubini Nxa ngi landela yonk’ indlela.

Z’u ngi thwale ngenhliziyo U nami owAkho umsa;
Z’u ngi gone ngezingalo Nxa ngi landela yonk’ indlela

title: 224 Khanyisani Izibani
content:
224 Khanyisani Izibani

U yakhany’ umsa ka Baba U vel’ endlini yAkhe,
Kodzwa thina u si phile Si khanye phansi lapha.

Chorus
Khanyisani izibani Ku bonwe ngaphesheya!
Kumbe u yashon’ omunye,
U ngamsindisa yena.

Ngenxa yesono ku mnyama S’chlelwe ‘zinhlupheko,
Kad’ elindele amehlo Ukubon’ ukukhanya.

Lungis’ is’bani, mfowethu Ye, omunye u khona
Ozamayo ukungena Emthimbeni we Wundlu.

title: 225 Yima Nje Ngeqhawe
content:
225 Yima Nje Ngeqhawe

uMsindis’ uthi, Wena mKrestu vuka!
Nesihlangu, nenkemba esandleni,
Ukulwa nomling’ u boya nges’ bindi,
Yima njenge qhawe, qaphel’ isitha.

Chorus
Yima, yima, njenge qhawe,
Yima, u si qaphele isitha

Loko okuy’ ingozi ku qaphele;
U ngahlehli nok’ ihawu lingekho,
Uma u zozehlul’ izitha zakho,
Yima njenge qhawe, u ziqaphele.

Yilwel’ indaba yeNkosi ngamandla;
U lwe kuze kube sekupheleni,
Yilandele noma ikusa ngaphi,
U lwe njenge qhawe qaphel’ isitha.

Qhubeka, iNkosi yakho ikhona;
Ikunika umusa nesibindi,
Lunje ngomfula uthando lweNkosi,
Ngako, yima uqaphele isitha.

title: 226 Cisho Ngivume
content:
226 Cisho Ngivume

Ngi cisho ukuba l’kholwa,
Ngi cisho uKrestu ngi Mkholwe,
Noko uthi ombi, Namhla, moya hamba,
Ngelinye ilanga, ngokubiza.

U yacisho ukuphenduka,
U cish’ ukuvum’ inguquko,
Ng’oba usancengwa, Futhi usanxuswa,
Ng’uJesu noMoya, Moni buya.

Cish’ ukuvuma kudlulile,
Cish’ ukuvuma s’u silele,
U ngebeleselwe, Nxa se ulahliwe,
Isililo sizwe, Ngi lahliwe.

title: 227 Esiphambanweni
content:
227 Esiphambanweni

UMsindisi wangophela, Yaf’ iNkosi yami;
Wazidela, wangifela, Ngi sindiswe nami.

Chorus
Esiphambanweni, ngabon’ ukukhanya,
Umthwalo wehliziyo wacasha (wacasha)
Kwaku lapho ngakholwa ngabona ,
Manje ngi yathaba impela!

Ngenxa yem’sebenzi yami, Yek’ uthando lomsa! Walenga Yena emthini, Ku yamangalisa!

Usizi kaluhlawuli Elami icala;
’Nkosi, nguWe inhlawulo ‘Ngi yazinikela!

title: 228 Dumis’ Undumise Umkhululi Wethu
content:
228 Dumis’ Undumise Umkhululi Wethu

Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu!
Huba O, mhlaba! Umemezele;
NiMbabaze ‘zingelosi, Ubayethe!
Onegam’ elingcwele kakhulu,
Uyelusa uJesu ‘zimvu zAkhe.
Uyazi gona ilanga lonke

Chorus
Dumisa uMdumise ubuhle bAkhe,
Dumisa ngehubo lenjabulo!

Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu;
Wafela wahluphekel’ izono!
IDwala lethu, iThemba, neNsindiso!
Babaza uMbabaze kakhulu,
Dumis’uJes’ othwal’ izono zethu
Uthand’ olupulile namandla

Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu!
Amasang’ ezulu ahlokome;
UJesu uyabusa phakade,
Mthwesen’ umqhele eyiNkosi yezulu
Uyez’ uKrestu unqobe umhlaba.
Ubukhosi namandla kukuYe

title: 229 Ngubani Ongas’ Enkosini?
content:
229 Ngubani Ongas’ Enkosini?

Nguban’ ozokhetha iNkosi? Indlela zimbili Khethake!!

Chorus
Khetha namhla!
Phakathi kokuhle nokubi,
Khetha namhla! Phakathi kokuhle nokubi.

Izinkulungwane Zi khethe Ukuma nokubi, U thini?.

Woza u zokum’ eNkosini Eny’ indlel’ ayikho Eqotho.

title: 230 Ngi Y’Indlela
content:
230 Ngi Y’Indlela

Njengemv’ ezul’entabeni Iduke nezinye;
Ngi ngathol’ indlela njani Ebuyel’ ekhaya?

Chorus
Ngiy’ iNdlela, ‘Qiniso nok’Phila,
Ku ngeze muntu kuBaba phandle kwami,
Ngiy’ iNdlela, ‘Qiniso nok’Phila,
Ku ngeze muntu kuBaba phandle kwami.

Insizi zingididile Sengi fun’iNkosi;
Abanye bathi, Lenale! Iqiniso liphi?

Krest’ ukuPhila neNdlela Ngi ngeze ngamshiya;
Wongiqondisa kuBaba Ngi hlale ekhaya.

title: 231 Vumel’ UJesu Enhliziyweni Yakho
content:
231 Vumel’ UJesu Enhliziyweni Yakho

Nxa udinwe umthwalo wesono,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni;
Um’uthand’ ukuqal’ Inhlal’ entsha,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni

Chorus
Ku dlul’ ukungabaza,
Manje mus’ ukumnqaba
Manje vula umnyango,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni

Um’ ukhalela ukuba msulwa;
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,
Iseduz’ imthombo yokuhlanzwa,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni

Uma kunohluph’ ongelu xoshe,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,
Nxa kunes’khala es’ngegcwaliswe;
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni

Nxa iz’hlobo zi ngasathembeki;
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,
Bona ukuth’ uJesu unjani,
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni.

Nxa wohlabelela nabangcwele
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,
Uma wongen’ ezinduni zok’phumla
Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni.

Chorus
Ak’ sekh’ ukungabaza,
Manje angisamlahli Manje ngivul’ umnyango,
Ngena Jes’ enhliziyweni

title: 232 Ngeze Ngakushiya
content:
232 Ngeze Ngakushiya

A ngi ngeze ngakushiya;
A ngi yi kukudela,
Ngi zakukuhola wena ,
Ngohlala ngi kugcina,
U ngemqenike okubi ,
Ngi hloniph’ ungesabi

Nxa u sekuhluphekeni ,
Hlal’ ekukhulekeni ,
Mina ngi zokududuza ,
Ngi zokukhanyisela,
Ezilingweni ngendlela,
Ngi zokukhanyisela

Nxa kuwe ku kuhle konke
U hanqwe kukhanye nge!
U hlalake wenamile,
U nento zi lungile
Ngi zakuba nawe Mina
Ngi kwendulele wena

Lapha u senhluphekweni,
Khon’ ezinkathazweni,
Uma wen’ u qinisela ,
Ngi zokulondoloza,
Uthando lwami lu nawe,
Phezulu oqondiswe

title: 233 Ngi Tshel’ Indab’ Endala-ndala
content:
233 Ngi Tshel’ Indab’ Endala-ndala

Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala Yokwanga phezulu
Ka Jesu nobukhosi Ka Jesu nothando,
Ngi tshel’ indaba kahle Njengasenganeni
Ngokuba ngikhathele Ngi ngongcolileyo

CHORUS
Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala; Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala
Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala, Ka Jesu nothando

Ngi tshel’ indab’ unense Ibe ngaphakathi,
Leyo eyokuhlenga Yelapha isono
Yiphinda-phinde njalo Ngi shesha ngikholwe ,
Njengamazol’ okusa Amuka emini.

Ngi tshel’ indaba leyo Uma wethusiwe;
Inkazimlo yomhlaba Inzima kakhulu.
Laph’ ubuhle bomhlaba Bu qhamuka kimi,
Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala Yempilo ngoJesu.

title: 234 UJesu Ukukhanya
content:
234 UJesu Ukukhanya

Zi yacul’ ingelosi Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe,
NgoMntwana ozelweyo Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

CHORUS
Si nokukhanya kon’ okuhle, Woza laph’ umsa okhazimlayo;
Njalo sizungezwe ukukhanya, Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

Thabani nonke zizwe Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe
Hubani namabandla Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

Makudunyiswe Yena Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe,
INkosi yaphakade Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

Bayethe! k’uY’uMtwana Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe;
Bayethe! Sokulunga Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

title: 235 Futhi Labuya Ilanga
content:
235 Futhi Labuya Ilanga

Labuya ilanga elingcwele uJehova waphumula ngalo,
Walibusisa khona kuqala Ngako wathi libe sikhumbuzo

Lel’ ilanga ke, si liqaphele Intando yAkhe ibe ngeyethu,
Nxa sifundile ukuMlalela Uyokuzwa ukukhonza kwethu

Nkosi yamazwe onke lalela Yizwa izwi labantwana bAkho,
Iz’thembiso zAkho zikhumbule Uthele kubona umsa wAkho

Bab’ osezulwini, Themba lethu Umyalo wAkho sihlangu njalo,
U ng’ uMlindi neSinini sethu Udumo ngolwAkho njalo njalo

title: 236 Vuka Moy’ Uhlabelele
content:
236 Vuka Moy’ Uhlabelele

Vuka, moya wam’ uthobe Udumis’ uMhlengi wakho,
Uthi mangi hlabelele O, yek’ isisa sesihle!

Chorus
U nesisa, u nesisa, O yek’ isisa sesihle!

Wa ngi bona ngonakele Wang’thanda nanxa kunjalo,
Wang’ sindisa ngi dukile Yek’ ubukhulu besisa

Chorus
U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ ubukhulu besisa!

Noba izitha zandile Noba umhlab’ ulwa nami,
U yahol’ umoya wami Yek’ amandl’ esisa sAkhe!

Chorus
U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ amandl’ esisa sAkhe!

Izinhlupo zi njengefu, Seziduma njengezulu,
Njalo um’ eduze kwami Yek’ ubuhle bomsa wAkhe!

Chorus
U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ ubuhle bomsa wAkhe

title: 237 Sukumelan’ UJesu
content:
237 Sukumelan’ UJesu

Sukumelan’ uJesu Mabuth’ es’phambano;
Misan’ umthetho wAkhe Mani ngawu lahli,
Ninqobe nokunqoba Imp’ iholwa nguYe;
Size sichithw’ isitha uJesu abuse.

Sukumelan’ uJesu Lalelani izwi;
Yiyanini empini Ngal’usuk’ oluhle,
Madoda, mukhonzeni Phakathi kwezitha;
Niqine engozini Lwanini ngamandla.

Sukumelan’ uJesu Thembelani kuYe;
Nowa nxa nizethemba Ningazisho neze!
Hlomani ngeVangeli Nikhuleke njalo;
Nxa nibizwa kukubi Ningaphuthi lapho.

Sukumelan’ uJesu Impi izophela;
Namhla kunga dum’ impi Ngomso ukunqoba,
Nobani onqobayo Wothweswa umqhele;
Yena kanye noJesu Wobusa phakade.

title: 238 Ngobani Labo?
content:
238 Ngobani Labo?

Ngoban’ abadlul’ amagagasi, Phesheya kwama ngcwaba bathi, thu!NgoJesu bedumisa, Behlanziwe liWundlu.

CHORUS
Bengena phakath’ eJerusalem’ eNtsha! Behlanziwe leWundlu.
(’Gazini leWundlu)
Bengena phakath’ eJerusalem’ eNtsha! Behlanziwe liWundlu.

Yibo labo ebusheni babo Bahlakani pha ba kheth’ uJesu;
Benela ngaYe labo Behlanziwe liWundlu

Yibo abathwal’ inhlungu laba Bazuza ukuphumla k’uJesu;
Begcwele ukuthula Behlanziwe liWundlu

Yibo abaphathekayo kabi Bema emlilweni obuhlungu
UJes’ uthi, "Nyukani!" Nihlanziwe liWundlu.

Baphephel’ ogwin’ olukhanyayo Sekudlule ukufa nenhlungu;
Bathaba njalo-njalo Behlanziwe liWundlu.

title: 239 Ukhathele Na?
content:
239 Ukhathele Na?

Ukhathele unosizi, Udangele Na?
Woza kiMi, ush’ uJesu, "Phumula!"

Amanxeb’ angi donsela eNkosini na?
Enyaweni kuz’ izandla, Akhona.

Inomqhele, kamb’ iNkosi Ewukhombayo?
Yebo, ngowamev’ osizi OkuYo!

Nxa ngimfuna ngimlandela Ngozuzani na?
Izinsizi nobunzima, Konkana

Nxa ngibambelela kuYo, Ngotholani na?
Wophumula ngaphesheya kweJordan

Nxa ngimnxusa ngize kuYe, Wothula yini?
Angenqabe ‘ze kudlule Izulu

Nxa ngizama, ngi Mlandele Ngobusiswa na?
Bathi, Yebo! Abangcwele Laphaya, Amen

title: 240 Emnyango
content:
240 Emnyango

Bhek’ uMsindisi emnyango; Selok’ enqonqotha njalo.
Kade asilinda Yena, Mvulel’ inhliziyo wena.

Uthi zithengele kuYe, Ube nokulunga kwAkhe.
Agcotshw’ amehlo abone; Usus’ ukungcola kuwe.

Izwi lob’fakazi lizwe; Uthi mawuzikhethele.
Uno kona, usivivi; Khuthazela uphenduke.

UJesu usezoqeda Ukusincengela thina,
Masinyane onensila, Uzohlala enensila

UJesu umi ngaphandle; Unceng’ inhliziyo kahle.
Uthi muvulel’ angene, Unga mbambezeli Yena.

Yebo, ngenisa umhambi, Phambi kwAkhe wophumula
Ujabule ni ndawonye; Wodla nawe, nawe naYe

title: 241 Izwe Lasebheula
content:
241 Izwe Lasebheula

Ngafik’ ezweni lenala; Imfuyo ngeyani yonke.
Lapha ku kukhaya okuhle, Nobusuku budlulile.

CHORUS
Ilizwe laseKhenani Ngiya kuma eNtabeni,
Ngithalaze ngaphesheya lapho kun’elam’ ikhaya;
Ngiya bona lon’ izulu, Isigodlo sakoMkhulu

Umsindis’ uhamba nani, Kamnandi siyakhuluma.
Ungidonsela phezulu, Kuwo umngcele wezulu.

Iphung’ elimnandi lona, Livela ezihlahleni
Imbali kazibuni le! Kukhon’ amaz’ okuphila!

Ziyafika kimi lapha, Ingoma zezulu lapho.
Ingelosi sihlabela Ingoma zokusindiswa.

title: 242 Si Busisiwe Isibopho
content:
242 Si Busisiwe Isibopho

Intamb’ ebophela, Inhliziyo zethu;
Kulo uthando lwezulu, Sibusiso sethu.

Phambili kwes’hlalo, Sizo zincengela;
Ukwesaba nokulila, Kwethu ku yophela.

Inhlupheko zethu, Nayo imithwalo;
Noku khalelana kwethu, Konke ku ndawonye

Nxase sehlukana, Kubanga usizi;
Kodwa siyethemba sizo, Hlangana phambili.

title: 243 Vuka, Moya Wami Vuka!
content:
243 Vuka, Moya Wami Vuka!

Vuka moya vuka! Thintit’ ukwesala.
Umhlatshel’ ob’hlungu, Uvezelwe mina.
Es’hlalwen’ uJes’ ung’mele;
Es’hlalwen’ uJes’ ung’mele;
Ngilotshiw’ esandlen’ sAkhe.

Uhlel’ ezulwini, Ukunginxusela.
Ngothand’ ol’hlengayo, Negaz’ el’ncengayo.
Igazi lAkhe las’thenga;
Igazi lAkhe las’thenga;
Lifafaz’ is’hlalo somsa.

Mahlan’ amanxeba, Ahlatshw’ eKhalvari.
Ahlal’ ekhuleka, Ayang’ khulumela.
Athi mxolele, mxolele;
Athi mxolele, mxolele;
Angafi ophendukayo.

Uyis’umzw’ encenga Ogcotshiwe wAkhe.
Angefulathele iNdodana yAkhe.
NoMoya uyamuzwela;
NoMoya uyamuzwela;
Uthi, ngizelwe yiNkosi.

title: 244 Woza Kumsindisi
content:
244 Woza Kumsindisi

‘Za kuJesu, ‘Za kuJesu, ‘Za kuJesu manje;
Manje, Wena kuYe, Woza kuYe manje.

Wosindiswa, Wosindiswa, Wosindiswa manje;
Manje, Wosindiswa, Woza kuYe manje.

Unamandla, Unamandla, Unamandla, manje;
Manje, Unamandla, Woza kuYe manje.

Cela kuYe, Cela kuYe, Cela kuYe, manje;
Manje, Ulindele, Woza kuYe manje.

Ulindele, Ulindele, Ulindele manje;
Manje, Ulindele, Woza kuYe manje.

Themba kuYe, Themba kuYe, Themba kuYe, manje;
Manje, Themba kuYe, Woza kuYe, manje.

Wobusiswa, Wobusiswa,Wobusiswa manje;
Manje, Wobusiswa, Woza kuYe manje.

title: 245 Alikho Elinye Ibizo
content:
245 Alikho Elinye Ibizo

Sine bizo likaJesu Elithandeka kithi;
Phezulu bathemba lona Nathi sithemba lona.

CHORUS
Bizw’ elihle, Alikho ibizw’ elinje.
Bizw’ elihle, Alikho ibizw’ elinje.

Alikho ibizw’ elihle Elithob’ inhliziyo;
Ngaphandle kwelika Jesu Nom’ enamil’ umuntu.

Ngiyathemba ngizombona, Nxa ezothath’ abAkhe.
Ngiyathemba ngizombona Ngithabe emoyeni.

Nxa evuma Ngisebenze Ensimini yeNkosi;
Kuhle kuphela uJesu Abusise okwami.

Nxa evuma nima ngife, Kuhle ngifele kuYe;
Kuhle kuphela uJesu Abe lithemba lami.

title: 246 Phons’ Izwana NgoJesu
content:
246 Phons’ Izwana NgoJesu

Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-uMhlobo impela.
Vus’ inhliziyo zethu, Ngekwenzele kona.

CHORUS
Phons’ izwana ngoJesu, Ngendlela losisiza;
Izwana nje ngoJesu, NgaYe ufakaze.

Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Lok’us’xolelwe.
Zama ngowAkhe umsa Ufik’ ekhaya le!

Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Njalo wena usho;
Ngiyamthand’ uMsindisi, Owangifelayo.

Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Kusekhon’ ithuba;
Ngokuthula uthi, du! Uyavuna ombi.

Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Ithemba nxa lifa;
Sukuma kubunhlungu Umethembe Yena.

title: 247 Shay’ Insimbi Namuhla Injabulo
content:
247 Shay’ Insimbi Namuhla Injabulo

Shay’ insimbi! Namhla injabulo.
Ngomuntu obuy’ enkangala,
Nang’ uyis’ emhlangabeza ngendlela,
Was’ emanga, okhatheleyo.

CHORUS
Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Kush’ iz’ngelosi:
Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Kusho ugubhu.
Yimpi enjengo lwandle lugubhuza,
Lwandis ingoma eligugu.

Shay’ insimbi! Namhla yinjabulo.
Ngoba umzuli ubuyile;
Inhliziyo ison’ isishiyile,
Ingumntwana ozelweyo.

Shay’ insimbi! Mema idili namhla
Ngokunqoba ziyacul’ iz’ingelosi;
Xox’ indab’ emnandi njenge zinyosi
Ngob’ umuntu uzelwe busha.

title: 248 Yini Ngabathathekile
content:
248 Yini Ngabathathekile

Yini ngabathathekile? Pambili beqhubekela
Bahlangana nsuku zonke Benyakaza bethandaza
Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa; Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!
Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa; Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!

Nguban’ uJesu? Ngani na? Kangak’ anyakazis’ umzi?
‘Sihambel’ esinamandla Ukwenz’ intando ngeningi
Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!
Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!

Jesu! NguYe okukanye Wezw’ ubuhlungu ngabantu
Wathwal’ in’thwalo yabanye Wakhulula nezithulu
Kwethab’ impumputhe zizwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!
Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!

Namhla indawo ngendawo Sihamb’ enyaweni zAkhe
NaY’ ukwe yeth’ im’nyango Uyangena azithobe

Pho! Singe memeze sithi Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!
Pho! Singe memeze sithi Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!

Ehhe sondelani nonke Nixolelwe naphunyuzwa
KuY’ uBaba nidelile Buyani namkele umsa
Zimpofana nans’inqaba Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!
Nin’ enilingwayo, Nangu! Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!

Kodwa uma niMenqaba Ninyundel’ uthando lwAkhe
Ek’pheleni wonishiya En’del’ izwi lAkhe manje
Nephuzile! Manidele! Ujesu udludile manje
Nephuzile! Manidele! Ujesu udludile manje

title: 249 Zazi Ngamashum’ Alithoba Nethoba
content:
249 Zazi Ngamashum’ Alithoba Nethoba

Zazi ngamashum’ ayithoba Nethob’ esibayeni
Kodw’ enye isemagqumeni
Ngapandle kwesibaya
Kuse phakathi kwezintaba
Yayehlukene noMalusi
Yayehlukene noMalusi

Nkosi, unamashumi angaka Awanele yini?
E, waphendula uMalusi:
"Yedukil’ enye imvu;
Noma indlela inameva
Ngizoyifuna imvu yami
Ngizoyifuna imvu yami"

Kakho kubahlengwa Owaqonda kunzima kangaka!
Laph’ inkosi yedlula khona
Ingaka tholi imvu
Phel’ imvu yayigula ifa
Phel’ imvu yayigula ifa

Nkosi, ophelan’ amathons’ Egazi enyus’ intaba?
Ophela lowo owaduka
Yen’ engaka buyiswa
Ngani izandla zalinyazwa?
Zalinyazelw’ izono zethu
Zalinyazelw’ izono zethu

Zonk’ intaba zaquma ngento
Kwath’ ekuphakameni
Kwenyuk’ izwi laya ezulwini
Lathi, "bongani imvu
Selitholakele igugu
Bongan’ iNkosi ngento yAyo!"

title: 250 Balekel’ Is’lingo
content:
250 Balekel’ Is’lingo

Balekel’ isilingo, unyamalale;
Kunqoba kosiza uzuz’ omunye.
Zam’ uye phambili, yeka ulunya.
Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, woku phephisa!

CHORUS
Hlala ucel’ uJesu,
Akugcine ngamandla.
Yen’ uyelekelela;
Woku phephisa.

Shiy’ ukonakala, lahl’ ukwethuka;
Ungaphaphi ngeze kukaJehova.
Cabang’ ukhuthale, yiba nomusa.
Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, wokuphephisa!

Yena onqobile, uzakuvuzwa
Sonqoba ngenkolo, noma sisawa
uMsindisi wethu wosiph’ amandla,
Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, wokuphephisa!

title: 251 Soze Ngasindiswa Ngokukhala
content:
251 Soze Ngasindiswa Ngokukhala

Soze ngasindiswa, Ngokukhal’ iz’nyembezi
Kunge luqed’ uvalo, Kungesuse isono
‘Kukhal’ akusizi

CHORUS
Wangifela uJesu!, Emthini wahlupheka
Ngase ngikhululeka, Ng’sindiswe ngoJesu!

Ngeke ngisindiswe Nayi senzo esihle
Imicabang’ emihle, Phinde ingenze musha
Umsebenzi yize

Khona ukulinda, Akulutho, ngizofa
Ngiw’ umsa endlebeni, Mangilinda, ngizofa
Ngoba akusizi

Ngenkolo kuKrestu ngizosindiswa kuYe
Ngithemb’ isenzo sAkhe, Mangiy’
ezingalweni; Ngisinde ngenkolo

title: 252 Woza Moni Onezono
content:
252 Woza Moni Onezono

Woza moni onezono
INkosi inesisa
Ngempela yokuphumuza
Nxa ushi’ izono

CHORUS
Themb’ uJesu, themb’ uJesu,
UboMthemba nje! Wosindiswa,
wosindiswa Khona, namhlanje!

UJesu wachith’ igazi
‘Waletha iz’busiso
Manje cwila kuzamcolo
Uhlanzwe yigazi

NguY’ uJesu oyindlela
Ey’ ekuphumleni
Uyokukhiph’ ebubini
Uma uMlandela

Woza kwes’mhlop’ isixulu
Uy’ ebungcweleni
Uhlal’ ekujabuleni
Zonke izinsuku

title: 253 Nangu uMalusi Umile
content:
253 Nangu uMalusi Umile

Nang’ uMalusi umile
Ethathekisile
Uyamemeza izimvu
Az’ gone zonke-du!

Uth’ azize kuYe manje
Kafuni zesabe
Lok’ ibusisa ezinje
INkosi yez’ngcwele

S’bek’ izimvu kuz’ izandla
Nkosi unamandla
Loku nathi singabAkho
Nans’ inzalo yAkho

title: 254 Dumis’ uJehova
content:
254 Dumis’ uJehova

Dumis’ uJehova Khon’ emagumbini
Vuk’ ubonge! Nas’ emukhathini
Zez’ uthando lwAkhe;
Nesis’ esikhona Ngokwenziwe

Beth’ impalampala, Kwandiswe ngeqolo
Ngangodumo! Makulethw’ imtshingo
Kuhutshw’ injabulo, Phakamis’ iphimbo
Ngak’ okwAkhe

Lapho ubabaza Thint’ intambo lezi
Kube mnandi! Yen’ uyashisiya
Wonke angaphezi, Esh’ ub’khulu bAkhe
EMdumisa

title: 255  Ngikudingile, Jesu
content:
255 Ngikudingile, Jesu

Ngikudingile Jesu
Loku ngingo mpofu
Nging’ umuntu’ ozulayo
Angi nay’ imfuyo
Ngidinga Wena Jesu
Ngibambe umgudu
Welus’ inyawo zami
Nayo inhliziyo

Ngidinga Yen’ uJesu
Njalo anginake
Ngize ngilwe nes’lingo
Engelekelela
Ngiding’ uMoy’ oNgcwele
Nami ngibe naYe
Ngifundiswe ngoJesu
Onge yam’ indlela

O Jesu, oligugu!
Ngoza nini kuWe
Ngihlotshiswe ngobuhle
Ngibe nobukhosi
Kuthi naba sindiswa
Njalo ngeneliswe
Ngicule ngingaphezi
Ngibusa neNkosi, Amen!

title: 256  O, Jehova Waphakade
content:
256 O, Jehova Waphakade

O, Jehova waphakade!
Themba elimile
Kuko konke Nqaba yethu
Ulikhaya lethu

Phansi kwesihlalo sAkho
Kukhon’ is’phephelo
Kothokoza izingcwele
Nathi sivikelwe

Zingaka dalwa izintaba
Ungekho nomhlaba
Phakade ung’ uNkulunkulu
Wena wedw’ umkhulu

Inkulungwane zem’nyaka
KuWe liny’ ilanga
Zona z’phelela ezeni
Wen’ ukhona nini

title: 257  Qinisiwe Njengedwala
content:
257 Qinisiwe Njengedwala

Qinisiwe njenge dwala
Mile njenge ntaba
Unjalo umnt’ othembayo
I Nkosi ephilayo

Intaba ziyehluleka
Khona endawen’ enhle
Nezandl’ ezinok’thandeka
Kuy’ indaw’ engcwele

Lunga Nkosi kwabamhlophe
Bebamb’ iqiniso
Ngayo inhliziyo enhle
Bengoni umthetho

title: 258 Yinye Inkolo Nomthetho
content:
258 Yinye Inkolo Nomthetho

Yinye inkolo noMthetho
Hhay’ iz’nkolo eziningi
Inkol’ eme kuyi njongo
Emthethweni ingasuki

O, Nkosi, sithethelele
Siwonil’ uMthetho wAkho
Wona muhle uphelele
Kepha siwonil’ unjalo

Thethelel’ inkohlakalo
Usus’ amabal’ amabi
Sisize sibamb’ uMthetho
Ngay’ iNdodana singoni

title: 259 Siyakuhlangana Yini
content:
259 Siyakuhlangana Yini

Siyakuhlangana yini?
Lapho kungathi cwaka?
Lapho kukhanya nanini
Kakh’ onokuhlupheka

CHORUS
Sohlangana yini? Phesheya kwawo umfula?
Sowu wel’umfula yini? Sibe la kuthi cwaka?

Sobonan’ ezibukweni?
Sekuphelil’ uhambo?
Sikhany’ ekuphumuleni?
Kul’izulu nesango?

Sohlangan’ emzini lena?
Laku khon’ im’bhoshongo
Nezindonga ziyakhanya?
Sazakhelwa ngob’ nono

Sohlangana noMsindisi
Ezolanda abAkhe
Nomusa wAkhe siwazi
Size sibuse naYe

CHORUS
Siya kuhlangana; Siya kuwu wela umfula
Siya kuwu wela umfula. Sibe la kuthi cwaka?

title: 260  Ngiyadlula Es’godini
content:
260 Ngiyadlula Es’godini

Ngiyadlul’ es’godini
Okuthiwa sisodwa
Kimina yiso isigodi
Sika Bhewula
Kodwa ngifumana kukhon’
Imbali ngendlela
UMsindisi useduze kwami
Yonk’ indlela

CHORUS
Sigodi sase Bhewula, uligugu kimi
goba ngibona khashana izwe elilodwa

Akuna thunzi elenza
Mnyama endleleni
Ngob’ imisebe yobukhos’
Iyayi khanyisa
Kusahutshwa kamnandi
Ezulwini laphaya
Kuqhamuk’ iphimb’
Es’godini ingethabise

Ngihamba ngithokozel’
Ukukhanya komuzi
Nsuku zonke ngijabule
Kukhanye kakhulu
S’god’ esihle sas’ Edeni
Umnandi emini
Enhliziyweni yokhathele
Ngamanz’ apholile

title: 261 S’godin’ Esihle sas’Edeni
content:
261 S’godin’ Esihle sas’Edeni

S’god’ esihle sas’ Edeni
Umnandi emini
Enhliziyweni yokhathele
Ngamanz’ apholile

CHORUS
S’god’ esihle sas’Edeni, Khaya labamhlophe
Kaningi emagagasini, Ngiphupha ngok’phumula

Enhliziyweni yokhalayo
Yimin’ ekhanyayo
Ineculo lengelosi
Liza nobukhosi

Nal’ ikhaya loMsindisi
Nabo abegazi
Kuphakamela phezulu
Ingoma enzulu

title: 262 Ngenze Njani ngoKrestu
content:
262 Ngenze Njani ngoKrestu

Ngizothini ngoJesu?
Ophambi kwami
Wembeth’ ingub’ ebomvu,
Unamev’ ekhanda

CHORUS
Manje yiw’ umbuzo, I yin’ impendulo?
Ngizobethela uJesu, Ngiyek’ uBaraba!

Ngokhulula umphangi,
Umunt’ ozidlayo!
Nokuba uMsindisi?
Yi’muph’ odelwayo?

Lombuz’ uyesabeka,
Ngonquma njani na?
Umsa usangi linda,
Usa thuthumela

Ngizo nquma kanjani?,
Noma ngithand’ izwe;
Ngibethele uJesu,
Kusind’ uBaraba?

Akuka khethwa soni;
Nxa kubuzwa kanje!
Nawe mKrestu omiyo,
Kuwo amalingo

CHORUS
Manje yiw’ umbuzo, I yin’ impendulo?
Ngizobethel’ uBaraba, Ngikhulul’ uJesu

title: 263 Zwan’ Amazw’ Es’bhalo
content:
263 Zwan’ Amazw’ Es’bhalo

Zwan’ amazwi eS’bhalo kwas’ endulo
Ngenisani konke okweshumi
Nivuseleke-ngcwele nanini
Nithembe son’ is’busiso

CHORUS
Ngenisani konke okweshumi
Ithi iNkosi Ningihlole
Nginehlisele is’busiso
Kuswelek’ indawo yok’samukela

Kambe nifun’ amandl’ oMoy’ ongcwele?
Ngenisani konke okweshumi
Nihlale nizwana naYe kamnandi
An’busise ngokungcwele

Kuvimbeni phakathi kweni naYe?
Ngenisani konke okweshumi
Nikulethe njengo kushiw’ izwi
Wonibusisa kwenele

Phakamisa iNkosi ngenhliziyo
Nje ngokub’ uletha okweshumi
Ubambelele esithembisweni
Senhliziy’ ethambileyo

Hlabelela kwenyukele phezulu
Sewulethe konk’ okweshumi
Sithi, Haleluya, sis’ enkonzweni
Sine s’busis’ esikhulu

title: 264 Ukuphumla Kuka Jehova
content:
264 Ukuphumla Kuka Jehova

Olungcwele uSuku
Luka Jehova wethu
Eligcin’ is’khombisa
Lwabusiswa yiNkosi

CHORUS
Lwamkele-ke, Lwamkele-ke
Siya kuthokozela, KweNkosi ukuphumla

Umsebenzi waqedwa
Lwase luqalwa lodwa
Walubusis’ impela
Ngaloko siya phumla

Lwaphendulwa ngabantu
Ngokuphumla ngeSonto
Hlola uMbhalo wAkhe
Awubatsheli loko

Abaningi ba ngathi
I Sonto lihle futhi
Keph’ incwadi yeNkosi
Yon’ iyabaphikisa

Ngahlola, ngalibona
Lempela iSabatha
Ngaphangis’ ukwamkela
Iqiniso nendlela

title: 265 Thul’ Uthi Du!
content:
265 Thul’ Uthi Du!

Thul’ uthi du!, Ezweni lomona
Kube khona uJesu kuwena

Thul’ uthi du!, Umsebenz’ omkhulu
Ukwena kahle intando kaJesu

Thul’ uthi du! Usizi lukhulu
Kuyen’ uJesu sino kuthula

Thul’ uthi du!, Iz’hlobo zikude
Sigcinwe nguJesu siphephile

Thul’ uthi du!, Kusasa asazi
Kuphela nguJesu oyiNkosi

Thul’ uthi du!, Amathunz’ okufa
NgoJes’ anqotshwe, sinelifa

Sekwenele komhlaba kwendlule
Ezulwini konke kuphelele

title: 266 Ngokulandela Jesu
content:
266 Ngokulandela Jesu

Ngokulandela Jesu
Ngizwa usangibiza
Ngokwethemba ngiyeza
Ngiy’ ekhaya ‘khulu

CHORUS
Ngokulandela
Ngokulandela
Ngokulandela
Noba ungisaphi

Amehlo angaduka
Nenyawo zishelele
Ngingahle ngikhathale
Wena unamandla

Usizi luyisitha
Izono zivimbile
Is’bindi siqinile
Ngilandela Wena

title: 267 Masibuth’ Okhanyayo
content:
267 Masibuth’ Okhanyayo

Masibuth’ okukhanyayo
Okusi zungezile
Sigcin’ ok’qhakazileyo
Siwa lahle ameva
Sithol’ okududuzayo
Is’busiso sanamhla
Isandla esisusayo
Singa shiyi ameva

CHORUS
Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa
Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa
Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa
Soyivuna ngomusa

Asiyazisi ingoma
Ingakacul’ inyoni
Asinakekel’ umbala
Zize zimuk’ izimbali
Asikhathalel’ ihlobo
Ngisho naka ncanyana
Engath’ alina njabulo
Yokwehlis’ umoyana

Uma singazwel’ ingane
Icindezelw’ emnyango
Ukuthi ingephunyule
Singabi namcabango
Lengane ingasibuka
Ibhekisis’ ubuso
Budatshulwe kubambeka
Njengo kuba kunjalo

O izandl’ ezibandayo
Zisi khumbuza njani
Amazwi asheshisayo
Asakazw’ endleleni
Yebo ziyasikhumbuza
Zibambeke buhlungu
Singawatshali ameva
Sovun’ is’vunguvungu

title: 268 Nkos’ Is’phepho  Sivukhile
content:
268 Nkos’ Is’phepho Sivukhile

Nkos’ is’phepho sivukile
Namaza aphakeme
Isibhakabhaka simnyama
No sizo lube kude
Kawukhathali sifa na?
Nak’ usalele nje!
Lapho imzuzu yonk’ ifinyela
Nethuma lisolwandle

CHORUS
Umoya namaza kong’lalela, Thula nya
Kuko lulwandle ol’gubhayo
‘Muntu namadimoni nani enye
Akukho mandlambi angagwinya
U Mnini lwandle kanya nomhlaba
Konke kolalel’ eNg’kushoyo
Thula nya! Thula nya!
Kahle kulalel’ eNg’kushoyo kuthule nya!

Nkosi, ngingodabukile
Ngileth’ usizi lwami
Inhliziyo yam’ inomunyu
O, siza Nkosi yami
Ububi beson’ ob’khulu
Bung’ cwilisa phansi
O, Nkosi ngizofa kabuhlungu
Sheshis’ ungisindise

Nkosi alusek’ uvalo
Umoya uthulile
Nelanga livel’ emanzini
Kwezulu ngik’tholile
Ungalibali Mkhululi
Futhi ungishiye
Ngenjabulo ng’welele phesheya
Kulonga izibuko

title: 269 NguJesu Umsindisi Wam’ Osimanga
content:
269 NguJesu Umsindisi Wam’ Osimanga

Ngu Jes’uMsindisi wam’ osimanga
Usimangaliso kimi
Ufihl’ umoya wami kulo iwa
Ngibone okuhl’ ok’ningi

CHORUS
Ufihl’ umphefumlo wam’ edwaleni
Elisith’ izw’ elomile; Ufihl’ ukuphila kwam’
othandweni; Ngembozwe ngesandla,
Ngembozwe ngesandla sAkhe

NguJes’ uMsindisi wam’ osimanga
Ususa okusindayo
Angiphakamise nginga sunduswa
Angiphe amandl’ amiyo

Imzuzu-nge-mzuzu ayibusise
Igcwaliswe ngoba Yena
Ngenjabulo nobukhosi ngimculele
U Mkhululi wam’ onjena

Sengembathiswe ubucwazicwazi
Ngomhlangabeza kulifu
Ngosindiso nothando ngiMdumise
Nazo iz’gidi phezulu

title: 270 Oweth’ Umkhululi Esefa
content:
270 Oweth’ Umkhululi Esefa

Oweth’ oMkhulu esefa, Wasivalelisa
Wasishiyela uMholi, Abe kithi

Uza kusiph’ isithunzi, Abe nguMduduzi
Um’ethol’ othobileyo Novumayo

Lakh’ilizwi siyalizwa, Lihlala lis’khuza
Kokubi nasovalweni Emhlabeni

Konke ‘kulung’ esinako, Nokunqob’ iz’lingo
Nemi cabango engcwele, Inge yAkhe

Moya ohlanzekileyo, Bon’ abawileyo
Thina sibe indlu yAkho, Ngeqiniso

title: 271 Kom’ Izono Zibomvu
content:
271 Kom’ Izono Zibomvu

Nom’ izono zibomvu, Ziya kuba njengeqhwa
Nom’ izono zibomvu, Ziya kuba njengeqhwa
Noma sezi the tebu, Zingaba mhlophe,
Ezakho ezibomvu, Ezakho ezibomvu
Ziya kuba njenge qhwa, Ziya kuba njenge qhwa

Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo; Buya kuNkulunkulu!
Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo; Buya kuNkulunkulu!
Yen’ ohawu kelayo, Nothand’ ol’khulu
Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo, Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo
Buyela kuJehova, Buyela kuJehova

Wosus’ izono zenu, Soze azikhumbule,
Wosus’ izono zenu, Soze azikhumbule,
Bhekani ki Mi zizwe; Ush’ uJehova
Wosus’ izono zenu, Wosus’ izono zenu,
Soze azikhumbule,Soze azikhumbule

title: 272 Phons’ Intambo Kok’phila Kul’ Iza
content:
272 Phons’ Intambo Kok’phila Kul’ Iza

Phons’ intambo yoku’phila kul’iza, Nang’ umfowethu ungamsindisa
O, ngubani ozozidela Aphons’ iNtambo yoK’phila emfela?

CHORUS
Phonsa iNtambo! yoK’phila!, Omunye uyamuka,
Phonsa iNtambo! Yona yoK’phila! Kushon’ omunye namhla.

Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila masinya, Ngani uyalibala kangaka?
Mbon’ esecwila, wenze manje; Ngomkhumbi woKuphila, yana kude.

Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila kofayo, Eshon’ osizin’ olwesabekayo!
Kuwo esililo amaza, Masinya azomkhukhula amanzi

Sizodlul’ isi’khathi sokulenga, Bawelel’ ogwini lokulahlwa
Kaloku mfowethu, sheshisa! Phons’ iNtambo namuhla basindiswe

title: 273 Yam’ Ezingalweni Zika Jesu
content:
273 Yam’ Ezingalweni Zika Jesu

Yam’ e’ngalweni zika, Jesu Angakusiza, akusize
Wethembel’ othandweni lwAkhe Akufak’ ingoma.

CHORUS
Yama kuYe, ezingalweni, Themba lonke uthando lwAkhe.
Yama kuYe, ubhek’ ekhaya, Themb’ uMsindisi wAkho

Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu, Wovul’ indlela, vul’ indlela
Lapho eya khon’ uMlandela Uhloniph’ ilizwi.

Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu; Leth’ ok’ thandayo, ok’thandayo
Lowo muthwalo osindayo Wunxusele kuYe.

Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu, Kubeke konke, konke kuYe
Inomus’ inhliziyo yAkhe Akaswele mehlo

title: 274 Owam’ Umsindis’ Uyangincengela
content:
274 Owam’ Umsindis’ Uyangincengela

Owam’ uMsindis’ uyangincengela, Ziyi ngcosan’ iz’hlobo, unothando
Manjena uhlal’ engelusa ngomusa, Sengathi lowam’ angaba ngowakho

CHORUS
U Msindisi, Ungowakho Owam’ ut’ ang’kutshele Yena ngowakho

Ngino Baba, Yenake ungiphile, Okubusisekile kwaphakade
Ngizo bizwa ngiMhlangabez’emafini, Sengathi ungabizwa nawe futhi!

Ingubo emhlophe nobukhazikhazi, Ing’lindel’ ab’khosini ngingayazi!
Nxa ngiyemukela nokukhanya kwayo S’hlobo, ngingathanda futh’ inge yakho?

Sengiphiwe ukuthula njengomfula, Loko izihlobo azikwazanga
Yen’uKrestu nguMqambi noMlethi wakho, Sengathi futhi kungaba ngokwakho

Esekutholil’ uJesu, tshel’ abanye, U Msindisi wami ngowakho nawe
Thandaza Abaleth’ eb’khosini nabo, Wophendulw’ umthandazo ngenxa yakho

title: 275 Iphakade! - Phi?
content:
275 Iphakade! - Phi?

Iphakade! – phi? Kus’ emoyeni
Kukhona njal’ emsindweni, ek’thuleni
Umbuz’ ophakeme, Iphakade! – phi?
Umbuz’ ophakeme, Iphakade! – phi?

Iphakade! – phi? O! Iphakade! – phi?
Nabahlengiwe, noma nabalahliwe?
La, noma laphaya - Iphakade! – phi?
La, noma laphaya - Iphakade! – phi?

Iphakade! – phi? Kunga kanjani?
Udakisiwe bes’ uthath’ umhlaba nje!
Wenz’ ungaqokile - Iphakade! – phi?
Wenz’ ungaqokile - Iphakade! – phi?

Iphakade! – phi? O! s’hlobo, bheka
Manje iNkos’ ingayek’ ukwahlula
Namhla kukhonjw’ iphakade lakho!–phi?
Namhla kukhonjw’ iphakade lakho!–phi?

Iphakade! – phi? O! Iphakade! – phi?
S’hlobo ungalali; bes’uthathizwe
Ungakaphenduli - Iphakade! – phi?
Ungakaphenduli - Iphakade! – phi?

title: 276 Yen’ UJesu Wez’ Ebhetlehema
content:
276 Yen’ UJesu Wez’ Ebhetlehema

Yen’ uJesu wez’ eBetlehema, Wazalelw’ emkhombeni ngosizi
O, isimanga ngelAkh’ igama Engifuna mina
Engifu... funa mina O, isimanga ngelAkh’ igama
Engifuna mina

Yen’uJesu esiphambanweni, Wakhok’ical’ el’khulu ngasinda
O, isimanga, kwaba kanjani Engifela mina,
Engifela…fela mina O, isimanga, kwaba kanjani
Engifela mina

Yen’ uJesu wakuyo indulo, Ngisazula kude nesibaya
Ngokuthamba wanceng’ inhliziyo Ememeza mina
Engimemeza... mina... Ngokuthamba wanceng’ inhliziyo
Ememeza mina

Yen’ uJesu wovela phezulu, Sihl’ is’thembiso semnyak’ edlule
O, ngoMubona ehla ngamafu Ezolanda mina
Ezola-landa... mina... O, ngoMubona ehla ngamafu
Ezolanda mina

title: 277 Kukhanya Yandulela
content:
277 Kukhanya Yandulela

Kukhanya yandulela emnyameni Hola mina
Ngikude nekhaya ebubini Hola mina
Gcina izinyawo ngingabheki;
Khashana kwenel’ unyawo lwami

Zange nempela-nje ngithandazele Ukukholwa,
Ngithand’ indlela ngizikhethele Ngibe ngedwa,
Ngesaba, ngiyathanda okuhle,
Kohlwa into zobami ubusha

Loku ngibusisiwe ngamandl’ Akho Mangiholwe
Ngedlul’ engcingweni ebamba nko Sekusile,
Kusasa ingelosi zethabe,
Ngengakuthanda sekusilele

title: 278 Akhuyam’ Indlela
content:
278 Akhuyam’ Indlela

Akuyon’ indlela, Nom’ imnyama Nkosi!
Ngihole ngokwAkho, Ung’khethel’ eyami
Ngingezikhethele ngingethande loko,
Ngikhethele Wena ngothi-ke ngime ngqo!

NgoWakho uMbuso, Vezake indlela,
Nokukhanya kuwo, Hleze ng’shiy’indlela
Gcin’ uk’phila kwami, noma kuhle, kubi
Ngokubona kwAkho Ngithole nantoni

Ngikhethel’ is’hlobo, Ng’xwale nom’ impilo
Ngikhethel’ okwami, ‘Nala nob’ indlala
Kunga khethi mina, kok’khulu nok’ncane
Ngu Wena Mandl’ ami, Nakuko okunye

title: 279 O’ Nhliziyo ‘Zithobe
content:
279 O’ Nhliziyo ‘Zithobe

O, nhliziyo zithobe, Nami mehlw’ elanga
Ek’kholweni kumhlophe KuJesu kukhanya

CHORUS
Zanini kiMi, en’si ndwayo;
Nin’ abakhathele nginganiphumuza;
Thwalan’ ijoka nifunde ngaMi;
Ngi munene Ngithobiles nothi; Nithol’ ukuphumula

Ingcebo nenjabulo, Akusizi muntu
Kuphela kuhl’ uthando, Lon’alubuhlungu

Is’duduz’ esikhulu, Senziwa nguJesu
Wen’uhlahliwe yini? Phenduka ungafi!

Uthule njengo mfula, Nengoma yAkh’ enhle
Kana’ Mthwal’ onzima, Lilul’ im’hla yonke

title: 280 Nmbusi Wethu
content:
280 Nmbusi Wethu

Ingoma ezimnandi, Ngelanga elihle
Sibonga uMsindisi, Ngenhlalo neNdlela

CHORUS
Bonga... bonga uMsindisi wethu
Bonga... bonga Ubukhosi bAkhe

Waye thanda’ abantwana, Nxa elapha phansi;
Noma esezulwini, Loku ebathanda

Sithanda ukuMbonga, Sizw’ indaba yAkhe
Nxa esahlala lapha Khona eGalile

O’ Nkos’ eBusisiwe! Siya guqa kuWe
Sicela ukusizwa, Siphilele Wena

title: 281 Kwavela Inkanyezi Eb’suku
content:
281 Kwavela Inkanyezi Eb’suku

Kwavel’ inkanyez’ ebusuku, Yakhanyiswa nguNkulunkulu
Im’sebe yahola izazi; Zaqondiswa kuMsindisi

CHORUS
Kusa khanya, kusa khanya, Inkanyezi ezintabeni!
Kusa khanya, kusa khanya Insindiso eNkosini

Zazi ngeM’bhalo iqiniso, Lenkanyezi ekhanyisayo;
Zalindel’ uk’khanya khashana, Oku nguKrestu indonsa

Solandel’ uk’khanya kwendulo, Loko kukhanya okwashiwo;
Solandela siy’ ezulwini, Sifike ‘kuphumuleni

title: 282 Inguzhu Zilishumi Lenkulungwane
content:
282 Inguzhu Zilishumi Lenkulungwane

Zwan’ amazwi walalele; Ehlatshelelwa phezulu
U Jesu uyabusa le, Liyathaba izulu
Ehlez’ esihlalweni, Wobusa emhlabeni
Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

Busa Nkosi yamakhosi, Busa kube phakade
Abakho bangehlukani, Lab’ osuba lobile
Benenjabulo yAkho, Besindisiwe njalo
Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

Phangis’ ubuye, Msindisi Usuku lwAkho luze
Nxase kuhlatshwa umkhosi, Umhlaba uyadlula
Sizohlabelela sithi, Dumo, dum’ eNkosini
Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

title: 283 Wena Na? Mina Na?
content:
283 Wena Na? Mina Na?

Omuny’ uzongena ngesango, Pambili, phambili
Ezwe ubukhosi bakhona, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yini?
Athath’ indlela yegolide, Abone okuhle khona le
Adl’ izethembiso zakade, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?

Isiphambano siyothulwa Phambili, phambili
Wethemb’ uzophiwa umqhele, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?
Omunye uzobon’ iNkosi, Ekhululekil’ osizini
Ethokoza naYo phakade, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?

Omunye uzongqongqotha le Phambili, phambili
Ilizwi lithi, Angikwazi Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?
Omuny’ uzoncenga’ angaziwa, Kuyize ukuzama kwakhe
Omunye uzoncintshw’ umvuzo Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?

Ingoma enhle yokunqoba, Phambili, phambili
Yoculwa ngabasindileyo Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?
Omunye uyobingelela, Abakade baf’ emhlabeni
Bazohlala ebukhosini, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?

title: 284 Edlula Amalanga
content:
284 Edlula Amalanga

Bakhon’ abane sizungu, Edlula amalanga
Bakon’ abahluphekayo, Edlula amalanga
Sibo moyizela-ke Ngendlela yethu yonke
Okuhle! singakwenza, Edlula amalanga

CHORUS
Edlula, edlula, edlula, edlula
Oku hle! Singekwenza Edlula amalanga

Mabu ngabikh’ ubuvila, Edlula amalanga
Ubuso abukhanye, nge! Edlula amalanga
Izwi linezinhlupho, Kukhona ukukhala
Siza yen’ owileyo, Edlula amalanga

Zonk’ izibopho zothanda, Edlula amalanga
Siya zishiya emuva, Edlula amalanga
Kodwa imbewu enhle, Esiyihlanyelayo
Iyo sijabulisa, Edlula amalanga

title: 285 Ikhon’ Indawo Y’kuphumla
content:
285 Ikhon’ Indawo Y’kuphumla

Ikhon’ indawo Yok’phumla KuY’ uNkulunkulu
Laph’ isono singehluphe KuY’ uNkulunkulu

CHORUS
O, Jesu Mhlengi omhle!, Ovela kuBaba
Siphase silindile, KuY’ uNkulunkulu

Ikhon’ indawo emnandi, KuY’ uNkulunkulu
La kukhon’ uMsindisi KuY’ uNkulunkulu

Ikhon’ indawo yekhefu, KuY’ uNkulunkulu
Lapho konke kuthe cwaka, KuY’ uNkulunkulu

title: 286 Thwala Mina
content:
286 Thwala Mina

O, ngondele lolosuku! Nxa abahlengwayo
BeseZion ngezimhlophe, Besekhaya labo

CHORUS
O, ngithwale, ngithwale Ngi yeZion;
Ngithwal’ ungise msizini wothando, Emsizin’ wabangcwele

Ngi yozwa o-aleluya, Iz’xulu zibasho
Umphefumlo ujabula, Nabahlengiweyo

Thabani ngalo losuku, Lufiswa sihambi
Lophelisa izinhlungu, Baphumle kuMenzi

title: 287 Ngesikhathi Sokulingwa
content:
287 Ngesikhathi Sokulingwa

Nges’khathi sok’ lingwa;
Baba ng’ph’amandla; Funa ngikuphike, ngidede kuWe
Nxa ngithengezela ng’bambe ngesandla
Ngothando lwAkho ungavumi ngiwe

Ngokuzitika ngingadonswa yizwe
Ububi busa yekile ukung’ bamba
Ngothando lwAkho Baba mangi gcinwe
Kuchithwe izitha kanye nolaka

Uma kuvela kuWe inhlupheko
Noma buhlungu bung’phath’ emhlabeni
Vuma ngisibone isandla sAkho
Ngencike kuWe ekuhluphekeni. Amen

title: 288 Into YoKupha uJesu
content:
288 Into YoKupha uJesu

Baleth’ iz’ pho kuJesu, Zabekw’ enyaweni
Ukuthand’ uMsindisi, kwabenza bamuphe
Ngomusa nangamazwi, Nokusiz’ abanye
Konke uyakubala, Kube kuhle kuYe

CHORUS
Ulethile kuJesu, Isipho esihle
Wathi, Nans’ inhliziyo! Wayibek’ ezinyaweni

Kwaku khon’ isihambi, Esasiqaphele
Iziph’ ezakhishwayo, Zabalwa zabanhle
Sasifisa kakhulu, Ukuleth’ isipho
Kodwa sema eduze, Singena lutho nje

Sakhala sathi, Nkosi, ngiyazi unomsa
Thabatha lonk’ okwami, Nenhliziyo embi
U Jesu waphendula, Wath’ Isipho sakho
Sihle kunazo zonke, Ezalethwa kiMi

title: 289 Ngi Thathe Ngi Nje
content:
289 Ngi Thathe Ngi Nje

Jesu Nkosi, ngiyakhala, Nkosi ngisize ngiyafa
Letha ukuphila kwAkho Ungi thathe ngi nje

CHORUS
Ngithathe, Nkosi, Ngithathe ngi nje
Sondeza usindiso, Ungithathe ngi nje

Ngigcwele izono Jesu, Ngegazi lAkho ngihlanze
Ngokuthanda kwAkho ngenze Ungi thathe ngi nje

Emihle imisebenzi Ayikho kimina Nkosi
Ngebizo lAkho ngi size, Ungithathe nje

Ngiya guqa kuWe Nkosi, Ngibhek’ enyaweni zAkho
Umsebenzi uqaliwe, Ungithathe ngi nje

Nxa uthanda ngisebenze, Ingqondo yikhaliphise
Mina ungisebenzise Ungithathe ngi nje

Ukuphela komsebenzi, Nxa seyiphelile impi
Ukukhala kwami koba Nkosi, ng’thathe ngi nje

title: 290 Sebenzela uJesu
content:
290 Sebenzela uJesu

Thaba! Siya sebenzel’ iNkosi Siya vuma ukuyenzela
Konke ekushoyo Yona kithi; Sizo kwenza ngokuphelele

CHORUS
Jesu ngaWe-ke! Sizoqhubeka, Ngokuthokoza
U sibusise Emsebenzini wAkho

Ngokwenama siyashumayela, Ngothando lwaYo ezizweni
NoJes’ ubukhosi buka; Yise Uzothela izibusiso

Ngothuthoba silandel’ iNkosi; Siyahamba ngokuphelela
Siyabaqondisa abeduki, Kulo iWundlu laY’iNkosi

title: 291 Li Fanele iWundlu
content:
291 Li Fanele iWundlu

Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lahlatshwa

CHORUS
Dumo Aleluya! Mbonge Aleluya!
Dumo Aleluya! I Wundlu!

Msindisi leth’ umbuso Uzoqeda izono Letha umbuso wAkho oNgcwele!

Ingathi singahlala siMthanda, siMdumisa Size sifik’ eZion’ siMbone

title: 292 Izandlana Ezimbili
content:
292 Izandlana Ezimbili

UJesu-ke ngi zoMsebenzela
Ngolimi-ke ngizoMbonga;
Indletshana zam’ zizokuzwa,
Ngizohlabelela ngezwi.

CHORUS
Nkosi, siyeza-ke,
Nxa sise ngabantwana nje
Nkosi, siyeza-ke
Sifunde ngaWe

Ngizohamba endleleni yAkhe,
Eya ezulwini lAkhe;
Amehlwana azakufunda,
Zika Jesu izindaba.

Ngizopha uJesu inhliziyo
Awusindis’ umphefumlo;
Inhlalwana yam’ ngi Mphe yona,
Okwami ngokwAkhe kona.

title: 293 Nqonqo! Nqonqo!
content:
293 Nqonqo! Nqonqo!

Nqonqo nqonqo ngubani, Umi umi omuhle
Usihamb’ esinomusa, Kazang’ abonwe onje
Ngaloko mphefumlo wami
Ungeze wavula na? Ungeze wavula na?

Nqonqo nqonqo nguJesu, Umi umi omuhle
Isivalo silukhuni, kuthandele ukhula
Lubambe esivalweni
Kunga vulwa kanjani? Kunga vulwa kanjani?

Nqonqo nqonqo usemi, Ulindile omuhle
Bon’ isandla sinenxeba, Sabethelelwa wena
Namehlo asalindile
Umvimbele njalo na? Umvimbele njalo na?

title: 294 Yembesa Ngo Kuphila kwAkhe
content:
294 Yembesa Ngo Kuphila kwAkhe

Bheka kuJesu kana sono, Baba ngiph’ ukuphila kwAkhe;
Impilo yam’ igcwel’ isono, Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe.

CHORUS
Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe, Ngomazi Yena ngokugcwele;
Ipmilo yam’ igcwel’ isono, Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe.

Made amanxeba esono, Ngiyesab’ amabal’ abomvu; Jesu, ngembes’ impilo yAkho, Ngize ngisind’ ekwahluleni.

Ngikhalel’ ukuthethelelwa, Jesu, ngibon’ ‘ingub’ emhlophe; Ngi ph’eyakho ngi lahla lena, Ngojabula ngihamba naWe.

Ngi buyiswa ngokufa kwakho, Ngenziwe nguYe ngaba mhlophe; Ngi hlanjululwe yizwi lAkhe, Ngi khany’ekubuyeni kwAkhe.

title: 295 Hlabani uMkhosi weMpi
content:
295 Hlabani uMkhosi weMpi

Hlabani umkhosi nas’ isitha; Vusan’ is’miso seNkosi
Hlomani izikhali nonkana, Thembel’ an’ ezwini leNkosi

CHORUS
Vukani mabutho, buthanani
Qhubelan’ ilizwi phambili
Hambani nimemeze, Hosana!
uKrestu yiNduna yomkhosi

Amandl’ okulwa siyowathola: Sazi ukuthi sonqoba
Isihlangu sethu siyakhanya, Sonqoba ngenxa yokulunga

Nkosi ephakamileyo sizwe, Ngomusa wAkho sisize
Nxa impi yonke isiphelile Siyozuza umqhele kuWe

title: 296 Msindisi Ngi Hole
content:
296 Msindisi Ngi Hole

Msindisi ng’hole kahle, Ngi ngeduk’ endleleni
Ngophepha nginga kuWe Ngihleli othandweni

CHORUS
Ng’hole, ng’hole, Msindisi ng’hole kahle
Ngomusa ungihole, Ngihole yonk’ indlela

Wen’ uyinqaba yami, Kuzo zonk’ iziphepho
Ngosinda nxa ngi kuWe, Wen’ ulithemba lami

Msindisi, njalo ng’hole, Phesheya kwenhlupheko
Ngofik’ ezwen’ elihle Laph’ inyembez’ azikho

title: 297 Zibethelw’ Emthini
content:
297 Zibethelw’ Emthini

Kwaba khon’ owavuma ‘kufela mina, Ukuz’ ongafanel’ aphile
Indlela yesiphambano wayihamba, Ezami zaxolelwa zonke

CHORUS
Zibethelw’ emthini, Zibethelw’ emthini;
Wezwa ‘buhlung’ obukhulu
U Jesu emthini wakhala ngomunyu Ethwel’ izono zami lapho

Kimina unesineke ethandeka, Ehlanzis’ eyam’ inhliziyo
Phinde ngilahlwe sengi nok’ khululeka, Ezam’ zingezi bethelweyo

Ngonamathel’ uMsindisi ngingadeli, Ngohamba ngithokoza njalo
Ng’cule ngomlomo nangenhliziyo yami, Ngith’ ezam’ zesuliw’ izono

title: 298 Qha! Okwami, Konke OkwaAkho
content:
298 Qha! Okwami, Konke OkwaAkho

Yek’ ubuhlungu nosizi, Ngihleli nginga kholwa!
Nxa ngisathi kuY’ uJesu; Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho
Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho, Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho
Nxa ngisathi kuY’ uJesu, Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho

Noko ngabuya ngabuya, NgaMbon’ efa emthini
Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe
Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe; Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe
Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe

Nsuku zonke wangi ncenga, Ngelashwa ngohlanzeka
Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke, Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho
Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho, Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho;
Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho

Luphakeme kunezulu, Lujule kunolwandle
Nkosi, lunqobil’ uthando Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho
Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho, Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho
Nkosi, lunqobil’ uthando Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho

title: 299 Zename Njalo
content:
299 Zename Njalo

Zename njal’ iz’nhliziyo, Kunga ngen’ ukusola
Lok’ uyasinak’ uBaba Es’thanda enomusa

CHORUS
Mazename njalo njalo, Sizungezwe kukhanya
Inobuhl’ indlela yemfanelo Sename njalo njalo

Siholwa isandla sAkhe, Isono asilutho
Uthembis’ ukusisiza Singaphuth’ isi’ thembiso

Uma siyek’ umsebenzi Sizw’ ub’ hlungu bokona
Siya mbozwa-mbo ithunzi! Licime ukwethaba

Yek’ injabulo yomsulwa! Ndlela yakh’ imhlophe
Masithath’ iseluleko, Zond’ ok’bi, thand’ okuhle

title: 300 Mphumula Bakhatheleyo
content:
300 Mphumula Bakhatheleyo

Khon’ekhaya labangcwele, Bophumul’ abeNkosi
Bophumul’ abosizi, Bophumul’ abosizi
Waya khona uMsindisi Ukufez’ ufiso lwam’
Ngophumula nam’

CHORUS
Ngaphesheya kweJordani, Ensimini yasEden’
Ngasemthini wokuphila, Ngophumula nam

Ungilungisele indlu, Eya kuma phakade
Ngoba ngiyohlala njalo, Kulelozwe elihle
Wophumul’ okhathele, Wophumul’ okhathele
Wophumul’ okhathele, Ngophumula nam’

Ubuhlungu bungengene, Nosizi luyoxoshwa
Kepha ngoba naw’ umqhele Wokuphila laphaya!
Zophumul’ intandane, Zophumul’ intandane
Zophumul’ intandane, Ngophumula nam’

Zindl’ amafa obukhosi, Hubani ngoku nqoba
Amasango ayovulwa Seningen’ ezulwini
Bophumul’ abanqobi, Bophumul’ abanqobi
Bophumul’ abanqobi, Ngophumula nam’?
